TheOrsini 08/07/2020 05:41
"Yes, we spoke with him. Although its hard to remember everything about the conversation." She address Sadao, "I have to assume that we wrote these things down for a reason." Koide looks at Ryuzuko after remind her. "Good idea, Ryu. Take Takumi and another with you. See if you can find a map in here. We will have to commandeer it for now."
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/07/2020 06:00
Viraj turns to follow the rest. As he does so, his boot catches something that rolls to the foot of a bookcase. He picks it one of the discarded earplugs and examines it for a moment before tossing it aside again. He hurries along to catch up with the others lashing his shield to his forearm as does proceeds. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 08/07/2020 07:07
As the group head back downstairs they are struck by a sudden, profound quiet that makes them feel like a noise that they don't ever remember hearing has recently stopped. A minute or so later the feeling fades and life returns to normal. Upon arrival in the lobby there is no receptionist, and why would there be? A receptionist has never been needed in this building. People can find their own way around. Nevertheless, a large and conspicuous hole has been smashed up through the floorboards... the building is clearly in need of some repairs... (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/07/2020 07:12
"Well, we found our entrance." Ryuzuko says solemnly.
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 07:16
"We need the powder to blow it up first." Koide was confused by Ryu's somberness. "And stop acting like someone died. It's just a hole. There is nothing we can do for the town until its dead." (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/07/2020 07:24
Ryuz shakes his head quickly, making a double take at the hole "Why do I feel sad about this hole? We know people are getting eaten, at least from what my note says, but why this hole?" He shrugs before leaving the building. (edited)
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 07:25
"Hey, did we get a map?" Koide asks Ryuz.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/07/2020 07:26
"I didn't, figured one of you grabbed it while we were there, I was staring outside for awhile, can't remember why though. Maybe I saw a pretty bird." He answers to Koide (edited)
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 07:29
Koide raises her palm to her forehead in frustration. I told you. Nevermind. Anger rushed in her mind. "Okay, can someone come with me real quick so we can find one?" She sets her chest down near the front door. (edited)
Mike 08/07/2020 07:32
Sadao folds his arms behind his head with a small smile at Ryu's foible. "Alright, let's go check." He nods to Koide, and heads back up the stairs.
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 07:35
Sadao and Koide return to the library looking for any maps of the area.
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 08:02
It doesn't take long from their search to find a map on animal vellum mounted inside a glass frame. Koide begins to grab a book to smash the glass and unpin the map, but notices a leather book laying on its side half open on one of the bookcases. She opens it to find a folio of assorted maps of the area. She notices one for the mine, and quick shuts the binding, placing the tough animal hide chord around it. "Here, got one."
Dandiil {Takumi} 08/07/2020 08:06
Takumi, holding his bag, waits at the entrance. His thoughts are a bit confused. He remembers coming in here to meet up with Koide and the dolphin guy, but things that he should know are escaping his grasp... Things just don't add up, and Takumi is trying to put those pieces together in his head. This is a little exasperating, something is definitely happening he thinks as he awaits Koide and Sadao to return.
Mike 08/07/2020 08:12
"Great," calls Sadao, his face in some older cartography scrolls. For a second, he looks back and forth for the magistrate, then scratches his head when he catches himself still doing it. Why am I so worried about him? He may be deaf, but he can take care of himself, and he's not in any kind of danger right now. It's as though there was a reason his life would be in danger, but it didn't make sense. Whatever creature they had been talking about seemed content to stay underground, never showing its face. Shaking his head, he heads back to the entrance with Koide.
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 08:55
"Okay," Koide says as they reach the group again. "Got a good map. Let's head on out. Stay out of the middle of the streets as best we can till we get out of the city." She looks to the dragonborn, "Ruyz, you want me to take point or you?"
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/07/2020 14:12
Viraj slowly paces back and forth in front of the town hall while Koide and Sadao go to look for a map. Noticing the rather empty streets, the lack of inhabitants now has him concerned knowing something is eating people. "There may not be anyone left to save by the time we return. It will be slow going coming back with a cart full of that stuff so we don't blow ourselves up. Speaking of... We don't have any horses or a cart." (edited)
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 14:20
"While you bring up a valid point, do you have a different way?" Koide asks Viraj. If the vacancy of the town was any indication, the druid would be right. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 08/07/2020 14:29
As Koide and Viraj pace about the square and debate their options, they pass a fountain outside the town hall. The water is still and looks like it has been for some time, but the reflection of something moving catches the eye in the afternoon light. An enormous head looming over the town hall... when they turn they see nothing.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/07/2020 15:39
Viraj gives a cautious glance to Koide, making sure she saw it too. He approaches the edge of the fountain and slowly circles it, looking for possible signs of others.
Kyle [Arcadian] 08/07/2020 15:44
Edging around the fountain, Viraj spots the reflections of four additional heads towering over the town on thick fleshy necks. (edited)
Cel 08/07/2020 20:51
Still confused about the recent events, Aralynn suddenly remembers something and pulls out a healers kit from her bag before handing it back to Ryuzuko. "Thank you for letting me use me this, your kindness will be remembered." She then turns to face her companions that have not entered the building. "If I am correct, unless we can think of another solution we will need not only the powder, but also horses and a cart. Do we have the funds to make such a purchase? I have 64 gold pieces to give to the cause, but I planned on spending some of it on some medical equipment." (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/07/2020 22:23
Viraj motions for Koide to follow and he gathers everyone by the front door of the town hall. "I haven't seen one animal of any kind in this town," he replies to Aralyn. The leaning in closer to the group, he continues keeping his voice low. "I count five heads. One is right over the town hall. I was able to see them in the reflection of the water in the fountain. So keep an eye out for some mirrors." (edited)
TheOrsini 08/07/2020 23:07
"I have one in my chest." She nods quietly to the chest on her shoulder.
Dandiil {Takumi} 09/07/2020 01:44

'so dolphin guy said he was looking into this fountain' Takumi sees something that seems familiar, yet not... "What is that?" Takumi is sure that he knows the answer... Somewhere in his mind, though it escapes him. The water rises into a dome shape and a few seconds later, the color of the water resembles a reflective surface. "I only see two heads," he quietly says as he beckons the rest of the group to survey the skyline. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 09/07/2020 05:55

TheOrsini 09/07/2020 05:57

Kyle [Arcadian] 09/07/2020 06:49
In the reflection of Takumi's ball of water, the town hall once more appears worn and delapidated.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 10/07/2020 06:28

TheOrsini 10/07/2020 06:33
"True, but it would be stored outside the walls, someplace easy to access the docks for travel, but someplace that if there was an accident, there wouldn't be danger to the city. Kyle [Arcadian] 10/07/2020 09:48
There are a number of warehouse-like buildings running along the harbour. The map doesn't indicate who they are owned by.

Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 10/07/2020 10:09

Mike 11/07/2020 05:21

Dandiil {Takumi} 11/07/2020 08:10
Takumi takes a small portion of the reflective water, large enough to fit in his palm. He follows the group, while occasionally glancing at the reflected image of the skyline. "There might be a sewer system... And being this close to the coast, they may have some sort of water runoff drainage in the case of big storms. They probably aren't large enough for the creature that I see there." Pointing to one of the heads in the reflection of the ball of water. (edited)
TheOrsini 12/07/2020 09:32
"There is no map in here of sewers. Although for a town this size would be a surprise... I imagine the thing has to be burrowing around though to be able to stay safe and still reach new victims." Koide voiced as they continued toward the docks.
Kyle [Arcadian] 12/07/2020 13:14
It doesn't take Koide much time to track down the warehouse that Takumi was talking about - a large wooden building with a red logo of a long flying dragon painted on the side. The large sliding freight doors appear to be locked, as does the smaller side entrance, which is clearly labelled PRIVATE.
TheOrsini 12/07/2020 13:24
Koide looks at the door and gives a devious grin. "Takumi, I think we need your skills here." She steps away from the door, confident in her companion's abilities. Her eyes focus on any of the laboring along the warehouses to survey the surround for guards who unfortunately would not understand breaking-and-entering to kill an invisible monster.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 12/07/2020 17:59
Viraj waits quietly nearby as a few contemplate the entry to the warehouse. He keeps his eyes towards the rooftops and the invisible creatures that he knows are lurking above. He pulls his weapon from his pack and begins to shift his weight from one foot to another, waiting for the unseen threat to suddenly strike. "How long do you think these things are going to let us just roam around the city," he asks the group. He keeps an eye on the progress of the door, waiting to see if a less delicate method is needed in opening it. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 12/07/2020 20:39
Takumi approaches the locked door, relying on the others to keep a lookout for him. Letting the ball of water fall through his fingers, He sets his pack down, leans his quarterstaff against the wall, and pulls his tools from his pocket. He slides the lock picks in, and has quite a bit of trouble with the rusty old lock. It takes a little longer than he expected, but the satisfying click let's him know of his success. "Got it" he says, more to himself than to those around him. He waves the others over, letting the open lock fall to the ground, and restores the picks to their home inside his cloak. He awaits the others by gathering his bag and staff. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 12/07/2020 21:59
The door swings open with a creak revealing a dark space that looks like it has been used for warehouse clerks.
Mike 13/07/2020 23:46
Sadao peers inside, finding it hard to see. He outstretches a hand, scattering a bit of phosphorous, and mutters a mantra in Primordial, sounding vaguely like ancient Honmin: "Linh há»“n cá»§a thiên nhiên, tôi cáº§u xin báº¡n, tháº¯p sáng con Ä‘Æ°á»ng." Suddenly, four small lights resembling lanterns are conjured, and float about, lighting the way into the warehouse. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 14/07/2020 04:36
Ryuzuko postitions himself outside the warehouse, in view and running distance to his companions, but far enough to not arouse even more suspicion. Obvious from his stature and equipment, he was never one for sneaking around trying to be unseen, a silver dragon born covered in armor does not go unnoticed easily.
Kyle [Arcadian] 14/07/2020 12:24
Sadao's dancing lights reveal desks and cabinets and the usual accoutrements of such an administrative area. On the far side of the open space is another door, presumably to the warehouse proper.
Cel 14/07/2020 21:35

Mike 15/07/2020 06:53

Dandiil {Takumi} 15/07/2020 07:51
Takumi looks back at Koide, and knows what he must do. He sets his bag back down out of sight, and quietly follows Sadao into the warehouse staff in hand. The light reflects off of his sparkling blue costume, and Takumi pulls his cloak a little tighter around his frame. Knowing that the paperwork is foreign, his staff bumps the chair as he makes his way to the door. Takumi checks for locks on the door before proceeding. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 15/07/2020 11:00
The door does appear to be locked, but the mechanism looks simpler than the one outside.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 15/07/2020 17:05
Viraj remains outside while the others investigate the office. He walks slowly along the outside wall of the warehouse, towards the freight entrance. Now knowing from what he saw in the fountain that things may not be what they appear, he runs a hand along the wall to check if what he see is true.
Kyle [Arcadian] 15/07/2020 17:07
Viraj finds a point where he stumbles unexpectedly. His hand slips and suddenly he perceives a hole in the wall. A hole about the size of a false hydra head...
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 15/07/2020 17:19
Viraj gives a melodic whistle to Koide and Ryuzuko get their attention. "We have something here. You might want to get that mirror out," he suggests to Koide. He passes his hand over the wall again, looks back to the pair and then steps through the hole that he perceives. He approaches a nearby barrel and reaches out to physically examine its existence. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 15/07/2020 17:28
Looking back to Sadao, he pulls out his lockpicks. He makes quick work of the lock, and the door slides open. He quickly replaces his lockpicks to his pocket. "Sadao, I'm going in." He walks through the open door and allows his eyes to adjust to the light in the warehouse.
Mike 15/07/2020 18:11
"Okay. I'm taking a look around." With the illumination of the lanterns, he checks the desks and cabinets of the administrative room for anything of note.
Kyle [Arcadian] 15/07/2020 22:40
Takumi makes quick work of the lock and slips through into the warehouse. It's filled with a mix of crates and barrels. Nearer the front he can see Viraj, who as somehow found another way inside, inspecting one.
Dandiil {Takumi} 16/07/2020 05:15
Takumi walks in and scans the room. A surprised gasp escapes his lips when he sees another figure in the room. Recognizing Viraj, he looks again at the assorted contents of the building. Looking back to Viraj, Takumi asks in a slightly accented Rajan, "How are we going to move all of this? Or are we going to lure the creature here?"
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 16/07/2020 05:35
Viraj arches an eyebrow at being spoken to in the language of his forefathers. He replies in kind, not remembering the last time he spoke Ranjanese. "There was a hole in the wall, he jabs a thumb over his shoulder. "Some sort of trick that the monster has used... Don't trust your eyes." He looks around the warehouse at the available inventory. The druid has a twinkle in his eye at the prospect of blowing something up. He continues in common, "Didn't one of you figure out that this thing springs up out of the ground... like a plant? If we can find the 'roots'...," he hands arc apart simulating an explosion. (edited)
TheOrsini 16/07/2020 07:18
Koide sets the chest down and relaxes while standing guard for the normal visitors. She digs into the chest and pulls out the steel mirror that they had discussed before. A short while passes as Koide pretends to fix her hair, in the meanwhile searching for the truth of the world in the reflection of the mirror.
Kyle [Arcadian] 16/07/2020 14:22
Searching through the paperwork, most of it seems to be purchase orders and inventory tracking. However, as Sadao looks at the most recent entries the text is interspersed with random messages saying things like "it's watching you right now!" "It's eating us!" "Help!"
14:22
As Koide watches the town through the mirror she can make out the blurry forms of the hydra's many heads bobbing over the buildings in the background.
Mike 17/07/2020 16:44
Sadao looks over the records, no less disturbed by the messages left in them. Leaving them on the desk for now, he follows the others into the warehouse proper. As Viraj and Takumi speak in Ranjanese, he begins to naturally understand it, but only due to his earlier magic. With little thought, he replies in Je'dahnian as they bring up the pressing issue of moving the fireworks they needed. "Right, the creature is nested underground. I think we've got no choice but to do the heavy lifting it'll take to get it down there." At the prospect of heavy lifting, naturally his thoughts went to Ryuzuko. "I'll get Ryu, and see if the others can find some equipment we could use for this. Oh, and there's a list of the inventory in the lobby. might be helpful for determining what's got the biggest boom." He exits the way he came to do as he stated.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 17/07/2020 18:37
"No need to start moving things until we know where we need to take it." He moves to the freight entrance and gives the beam barring the door a tug. Realizing it may be a bit much for him alone he waits for Ryuko to assist. "If we find us a cart we can go ahead and start loading it. I can move it around town when we know where it will be useful." (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 18/07/2020 03:05
Ryuz sees Sadao exit the building, "Found what we need?" he asks the human.
Cel 18/07/2020 03:22
Noting the return of her allies, Aralynn asks, "Will we be carrying out this plan today? If we wait until tomorrow I can pray for spells that could help us. I fear I might not be of much use in my current state."
Mike 18/07/2020 03:38
In response to Aralynn, Sadao folds his arms in thought. "Well, I'm not too keen on sleeping here, now that I know my neighbor is a man-eating monster. Personally, I think we ought to go ahead and do this as soon as possible, before even more people are eaten. But given the amount of work we'll have to do to haul enough fireworks out of here, we might not have a choice but to rest. When we do though, it'll have to be outside the town." He looks to Ryuzuko. "Partially. There's fireworks in there, but we'll need equipment if we want to move itâ€”not to mention your strength. Viraj found a freight entrance, I'll light the way so you can help him unbar it. Remember, no flames while we're in there." Sadao leads him to it, explaining along the way.
Dandiil {Takumi} 18/07/2020 03:51
Takumi considers Viraj's words, while he's looking for product that resembles simple flash powder. He nods half-heartedly at Sadao and his thoughts are evident in spoken words. "I'm concerned... an explosion large enough to damage or even kill the hydra... Under the town... What kind of damage would the town or would we sustain?" Takumi's voice trails off as he continues muttering to himself, 'I think I can remember the symbols from the last time I bought the flash powder. Are these it... no, it doesn't look familiar. I give up, I don't remember.' Takumi makes his way back towards Viraj. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 18/07/2020 03:54
"Lead the way then Sadao, we can at least get this door opened." Ryuz says to Sadao, cracking his knuckles while stretching his neck enough that it also cracks.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 18/07/2020 04:59
Viraj shrugs at Takumi's assessment. "It doesn't look like there's much hope left for this place. Best to kill it before it moves on to another. As for us... I don't plan on being that close when we set this stuff off." The Rajani leans up against the door as he waits for assistance. "By the way, one of those things came through here by the looks of the hole in the wall over th- ..." The man looks where he came in and it appears back to normal. He shakes his head and once again runs his hand along the wall to find his point of entry into the warehouse. "Damn things playing tricks on us!" (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 18/07/2020 12:18
As Takumi wanders the interior of the warehouse inspecting the crates, he suddenly feels the ground give way beneath his feet!
Kyle [Arcadian] 18/07/2020 21:39
Reacting quickly, the magician grabs the edge of the floor, clinging onto the broken wooden floorboards. Below him a dark hole leads down under the warehouse. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 19/07/2020 01:55
Takumi is moving towards Viraj when he lets out a high pitched Yelp. A hole in the floor opens up beneath him and he reacts as well as he knows. Catching the edge with the help of his quarterstaff, Takumi looks down into the chasm below him 'ok that long fall would hurt.' Hanging from one hand isn't working for him. He assesses the situation and quickly throws his other hand up to hold himself up. Which proves a bit difficult because the floor around him seems whole. Unable to pull himself up, and less than 2 seconds after the floor removed itself from under his feet, Takumi calls out urgently loud but with a calmness that may suggest a solution... "I could use some help here!" (edited)
TheOrsini 19/07/2020 02:11
Koide drops the steel mirror at the call of her 'friend? where they friends?' The thought had really never occurred to her before. 'She had always had some sway over him so she could use him when he was needed. But maybe that had changed?' These thoughts race through her mind as she bounds through the door trying to reach. Takumi. She grips the tsuka of her katana as she plunges into the heart of the warehouse, growing wary of the deepening darkness, in case the creature was attacking. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 19/07/2020 02:23
Ryuz follows suit, reading to unsheathe his weapon, running right behind Koide.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 19/07/2020 03:20
Still in the midst of searching for the hole in the wall - again, Viraj stops his investigation when he hears the cry behind him. He rushes to the edge of the sinkhole and grabs Takumi to hoist him back up by the straps of his backpack. "Looks like you may have found out how one of those things got in here," he says after dragging him back to solid ground. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 19/07/2020 03:44
Shaking off the near death experience, Takumi thanks Viraj vehemently, for the rescue. In between the constant thanks, Takumi mentions things like, "we don't need a cart; that is one deep hole" and "I may have found a solution to our 'problem'"" Takumi allows his adrenaline to decrease for a moment. he realizes the response that he has experienced the last time he missed a trap with Koide. 'well at least I didn't fall this time...' When Koide busts through the door ( as she tends to do) Takumi is ready with the calm signal that she uses on him more often than not. (edited)
Mike 19/07/2020 04:25
Sadao runs in with Ryu and Koide, drawing his bo as the lanterns light the area. He'd expected to see the aberration revealed, but was relieved that it was only Takumi and Viraj, having rescued the former from a sinkhole. "Thank the gods you're okay," he says, slinging his weapon once more. He approaches the hole, attempting to peer inside. Finding it difficult, he makes a subtle motion with his fingers, animating the mystical lights, and sending them spiralling down the hole to light it. "Yeah. this may be exactly what we needed." Sadao muses, his voice echoing slightly into the pit. He turns to the rest of the group. "So... this could work! We'll start unpacking the fireworks, and bring them down the hole piece by piece, one of us stays behind to light the fuse, hurrying out and... boom! No more hydra!" (edited)
TheOrsini 19/07/2020 04:47
Koide burst through the ajar door shoulder first hand on the blade preparing to draw, but sees Takumi standing their collected already gesturing that everything was okay. She looks over to Viraj nearby, frowning. She wasn't displeased, merely disappointed. She takes her hand off her sword, and steps out of the way of Sadao and Ryu. She had prepared her mind for a battle, and with it lacking, she was not willing to lash out at the others. She quietly waits moments to calm and center herself. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 19/07/2020 04:51
Ryuz looks over the hole, carefully as to not fall in. "We will need to lure it here as well. Not much sense blowing this up, if it's not even there."
TheOrsini 19/07/2020 05:02
She looks over to Ryu, thoughtful, yet her tone comes out in a mocking fashion, "Maybe it would like your little band." Koide tries to explain better - her tone slowly defusing as the calm returns. "I mean it uses sound, it may be sensitive to sound. There are no barking dogs that I've heard, no merriment in general. Maybe its first targets are those that make the most noise." (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 19/07/2020 05:51
Viraj helps the man to his feet and gives him a slap on the back - with not the softest of touch - to knock some of the dirt off. He returns Koide's look with one of confusion, then dismisses it. "Maybe we will be lucky enough that we won't need to lure it down there... Could be there already." Using the axe-end of his maul, he begins to carve the floorboards around the edge of the hole. "So we can find it again. Don't want to lose it like the hole in the wall over there," he explains then waves his hand to the area where he thinks he found the improvised entrance. (edited)
TheOrsini 19/07/2020 06:39
Koide looks to where the Viraj points and pats against the wall feeling for a break in the plaster and wood.
Kyle [Arcadian] 19/07/2020 06:58
When Takumi looks down into the hole, he sees a tunnel sloping away into darkness. It's steep, but potentially traversable.
Kyle [Arcadian] 19/07/2020 23:11
Koide feels along the wall until she eventually slips through it when she finds the hole that Viraj has described to her.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 20/07/2020 18:13
"I'll take a look," Viraj says stepping to the edge of the hole. "Someone want to check if any of this stuff," he motions to the barrels and crates, "has any regular powder? We're not here to make a performance." Without waiting for a response he hops down into the hole to check out what can be seen by Sadao's magical lights. (edited)
Cel 20/07/2020 20:25
"I will take a look." Aralynn goes over to the barrels and crates and investigates their contents.
Kyle [Arcadian] 20/07/2020 21:36
The crates contain packaged fireworks, but the barrels appear to be for the storage of raw black powder.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 20/07/2020 21:44
"We still need to find some mirrors before we even attempt to fight this thing. If a few of us stay here and unload the fireworks into the tunnel, while the rest look for some mirrors, or any alternatives." Ryuz says, now eyeing the various crates of fireworks, judging how much they might weigh.
Dandiil {Takumi} 20/07/2020 22:55
Takumi looks around the warehouse at all of the heavy boxes. "I have an idea" He moves quickly to his pack and digging around, he pulls out a set of pulleys and some cable. He presents the Block & Tackle for everyone to see and perhaps to take. "We can lower the crates and barrels a little easier with this. I can go below to unhook them, if someone wants to lower them to me." He attaches his grappling hook to some sturdy floorboards, and climbs down the rope, leaving the block and tackle nearby. He tries to locate a good spot for the containers. (edited)
Cel 21/07/2020 01:02
"We know that this creature is dangerous, lets not send someone down there alone if we can't be certain of its location." Aralynn looks at Takumi "I will go with you, that way if anything were to happen one of us can get the others to help."
Mike 21/07/2020 01:57
Sadao peers down the shaft again, and keeps an eye on Takumi while he checks the area below, getting ready to pull him back up at a moment's notice, just in case. "Good idea, Ryu. Anyone want to find stuff that'll work? I think I'll be most helpful right here."
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 21/07/2020 06:14
"I will stay here as well, and begin moving some of these barrels into the tunnel, we can bring a few with us as we explore it." Ryuzuko says before grabbing some of the rope laying around the warehouse, then prepping one of the barrels of gunpowder to be lowered down.
TheOrsini 23/07/2020 02:56
Koide steps through the wall. Its an interesting experience, she had seen illusions before but this felt different. It didn't lift with her recognition. She heads back to where she was standing before and reaches down for the mirror she had dropped. She seemed to sweat and her head was on the edge of an ache. She had wanted the mirror to test something but the moment passed her by. She looked into the mirror to look for the creature? It was on the edge of her memory.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 23/07/2020 16:58
Viraj peers up to from the bottom of the hole and watches the others discuss matters. He turns to Ryuzuok, "I am going to scout the tunnel ahead a little bit." As the light fades from the orb of light floating nearby, he places a hand over his eyes. "Eayst-hooill," he says quietly. Pulling his hand away, he proceeds down the tunnel now able to navigate the darkness. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 23/07/2020 17:05
The tunnel appears to have been bored out of the earth and extends away into the distance for several hundred feet, slowly sloping away beneath the town. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 25/07/2020 11:02
Koide glances in the mirror and she sees something moving nearby, like a snake slithering around the edge of the mirror's field of view.
Dandiil {Takumi} 26/07/2020 22:47
Takumi waits at the bottom, collecting the barrels that Ryu is passing down. He sets the barrels to the side about 40' away from the entrance. He watches as Viraj walks away. Having only worked as a partner, first with Hestia, and later with Koide. 'so this is a real team.' Takumi smiles with the realization that he can be useful to a group of people.
Mike 27/07/2020 20:42
Sadao makes sure the rope leading into the tunnels is secure, as Takumi and Ryu start work on getting barrels underground, and Viraj begins to scout out a place to put them. "You guys all right down there?" He calls, trying not to be too loud. "I'm going to look for a way to help you locate it. Be careful until then, okay? Especially you, Viraj, if you're going on ahead." The floating lanterns wink out one by one as he steps away from the hole. He looks to Koide. "You've got some experience with, uh... taking out supernatural creatures, right? My place is more to talk with them. Any idea how to spot it, or track it?" (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 27/07/2020 20:50
Soon Ryuzuko and Takumi have collected a large quantity of black powder in the mouth of the tunnel. Meanwhile, Viraj hears no movement in the tunnels, but he can feel the air currents coming from the two that slope up towards the surface. Deeper down, the earth smells rich and moist. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 28/07/2020 16:57
After taking some time to sit and listen for any movement within the tunnels, Viraj decides to return to the warehouse. He gives a nod of approval with the stack of barrels that have been hauled down into the hole. He reports to the others what little he discovered. "The tunnel goes deeper then splits into three others about five chains or so down. I heard nothing, but two of the splits went to the surface, while one even deeper. It had a damp smell to it. Maybe it opens up to a water source." (edited)
TheOrsini 28/07/2020 22:08
As she slowly, warily, creeps back toward the door walking in reverse trying to catch a reflection of the creature, Koide hears Sadao's question through the doorway. Through grinding teeth, she said flatly with stress in her voice. "Very carefully." Her blade is drawn, but she is unable to walk backwards, glance through the mirror, and take a fighting stance. It was not something she trained for. She makes it to the doorway and back inside, shutting the door behind her. She really didn't care if anyone saw the awkward dance; this was life or death and she still had plenty of the things left to be done.
Dandiil {Takumi} 29/07/2020 17:37
Sweating from the exertion, Takumi looks at the stash of powder. He calls up to Ryu, "With that last one, we should have enough. I don't know how we are going to transport all of it." Hearing the echo of his voice down the tunnel, Takumi realizes that his voice may have been a little louder than he intended.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 30/07/2020 08:43
"We should find a cart that we can haul the barrels through here on," Ryuzuko answers to Takumi while putting down the last barrel. "There has to be one nearby that we can borrow" he says in a way that portrays that he figures the cart will explode with the barrels, making it hard to return. "Let us find some mirrors as well, I doubt anything is going to happen to these barrels while we are gone and we need to stick together as much as possible. No telling when it might attack us." he adds before leaving the hole, and heading towards the exit of the warehouse. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 30/07/2020 14:13
Silence falls.
TheOrsini 30/07/2020 14:15
The quiet is deafening. The noise that wasn't there becomes so noticeable when it was quiet. Koide's ears might have rung or echoed or anything, but she checked her mirror with her blade ready. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 30/07/2020 14:18
In her mirror's reflection, Koide sees a familiar grey head rear up out of the hole behind Viraj it snakes left and right as its jaws slowly open.
TheOrsini 30/07/2020 14:23
"The hole! Its here. Viraj look out." She dashes backwards toward the creature bringing her blade up and around with a spin using the mirror for reference in the whirling dance.
Mike 30/07/2020 21:53
Sadao watches Koide with the mirror, and quickly picks up on the idea. But before he can comment on it, she leaps into action, and a giant gray head comes into view! Wait, that's what it looked like?! thinks Sadao, recoiling at the sight. Never thought I could forget a face that ugly... Shaking off his disgust, he outstretches his hands towards the aberration, and shouts in Primordial, "Bám vào nó!" Suddenly, swarms of tiny, ethereal creatures resembling fireflies appear from his sleeves, surrounding the false hydra's head. Before confirming whether the spirits were successful in latching onto it, he darts over to a crate, rolling behind it. He draws his bow, knowing all too well that there wouldn't be negotiations here. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 30/07/2020 22:17
Takumi hears Koides call and casts a spell upon his staff. He scrambles up the hole to see a horrendous face. 'is that what we've been preparing for?' He drops his backpack on the floor. Muttering something and reaching his hand out, the air begins to compress around his hand. The tight ball of air refracts light to give it a rainbow hue. It speeds across the room towards the gaping maw. The head moves just enough that the ball of air flies through its mouth, failing to contact the creature.
Cel 31/07/2020 00:29
Seeing everyone jump into battle with the foe that had been terrorizing the town, Aralynn realises they might not be able to kill it like this, and that their best chance is to drive it back to the hole and use the explosives. Acting on her previous training she rushes forwards, her right hand crackling with energy as she thrusts it towards the head, releasing the energy onto a single point. "Return to your hole!"Missing the attack, she channels her eladrin heritage, disappearing in a burst of frost and cool air which surrounds the head. Aralynn reappears as far as she can from the creature within 30 feet. (edited)
TheOrsini 31/07/2020 09:37
Surprised by her cohort's speed, Koide surges forward noticing her own eyes could finally behold this abomination. The mirror clatters to the floor as she bounds into the creatures reach. She continues the spin, slicing low along the ground before coming around with an upward slice. Neither seems to hit true but scratch against its toughened hide. Small lines of whitish ooze slides down its sickened skin.
Kyle [Arcadian] 31/07/2020 11:07
Irritated by the glancing blow, the eyeless head rears up over Koide before plunging its cavernous, fang-lined mouth down towards her. Quick on her toes, the Je'dahnian woman neatly sidesteps the clumsy attack and the hydra ploughs into the floorboards, sending splinters of wood flying in all directions. Yanking its face back up out of the floor it looms over Koide with obvious malintent.
TheOrsini 31/07/2020 13:36
Sliding back into her stance, Koide takes advantage of the creature's slow clumsy movements to slice another neat tear at the creature's skin. She flourishes the blade to cleanse the ichor and brings it back to a high guard.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 31/07/2020 16:38
At Koide's alarm, Viraj spins on his feet and finds the one of the creature coming from the hole. He grasps his maulaxe tight with both hands and gives a crooked grin. "I've dealt with the pines of Je'dahn not much smaller! You will fall too!" Then he lets out a roar. The air around him increases slightly in temperature as his fury comes to the surface and the brambles and vines sprout from his body offering the him their protection. The former lumberjack draws back his weapon and opens up a wound in the thick flesh as he would take a notch out of a tree. He shuffles back to admire his work. His demeanor soon changes when the creature takes notice of him. If the false hydra had shoulders, they would have rolled as it is filled with a swell of energy. Viraj's smirk is immediately wiped away. "C'mon, then!" he taunts, readying himself for the coming challenge. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 31/07/2020 20:05
As Ryuz is heading towards the exit of the warehouse, he hears the cries of his comrades, just before wooden splinters fly by him, clinking off his armor. "There it is" he thinks to himself as he cracks his knuckles and neck at the same time, before turning to face the foe. Seeing the huge head, outlined in a bright red light, illuminating the warehouse. "That light sure makes it an easy target!" he exclaims as he unsheathes his odachi. He brings the point to bear at the creature, before swiftly angling the blade at his side, pointing behind him. He then charges at full force towards it, letting out a draconic roar, the heavy sounds of his feet echo throughout the warehouse. As soon as he reaches the monster's head, he unleashes the odachi with all his might, slicing a clean horizontal cut through its side. The cut wasn't as deep as he would have liked, but he hoped the creature would slowly wane from the party's successful attacks. He then readies himself, holding the massive blade high in the air, light flickering off its polished edge as it sways. (edited)
TheOrsini 01/08/2020 07:26
Koide spins her guard into a flourish trying to distract the creature but it seems to ignore the blade. Instead she slides along the ground spinning her blade at chest height landing another cut into the fleshy skin, more of the purulent fluid oozes from the strikes. She frowns her blade's ineffectiveness, and adapts a low stance ready to move if the creature lashes at her again. 'I have to try something different.' she thinks.
Mike 01/08/2020 08:06
Hearing Ryu's jubilant confirmation, Sadao peeks from out of cover, and grins as he sees the firefly spirits clinging, guiding each of his allies' strikes. "Those spirits won't remain forever, they scare easily! Keep up the attacks!" He adds his own arrow to the onslaught, landing a decent hit on its cheek.
Dandiil {Takumi} 01/08/2020 08:08
Takumi sees his opening, he grips his staff in both hands and approaches the head of the beast. The air around the staff seems to split and With a crack that shakes the damaged warehouse, the end of the quarterstaff collides with the reptilian jaw. With effortless grace, Takumi spins the other half of the staff up to the creatures mouth, striking with a dull thud against the leathery skin. He looks to Koide with a grin "I guess your training is paying off!" (edited)
Cel 01/08/2020 12:25
Waiting for a clear shot, Aralynn focuses her divine energy into a concentrated ball of light. As soon as she knows she won't hit any of her allies who have gotten close to the creature, she releases the energy into a solid beam of light, hoping to not only damage the creature, but also to light it up, making it easier for others to it. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 01/08/2020 13:50
The hydra bellows furiously as it is pummelled from all sides and throws itself at Takumi, but the half-elf neatly sidesteps the attack with a twirl of his staff.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 01/08/2020 19:51
With the monster distracted by the others, Viraj continues his business of trying to chop it down. He brings his axe back over his shoulder and takes aim next to open up the wound further that he made. He makes a quick down swing for his initial cut. Then swings again, bringing the blade across horizontally. Twisting his hips around with great momentum, he drives the blade deep into its flesh again. So well in fact, this time that his weapon becomes stuck. To assist in dislodging it, Viraj kicks the creature driving his thorns deep into its flesh to gain some extra leverage. Giving the handle a mighty pull, it finally breaks away with a sickening, wet sound and another large chunk of its hide is removed. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 01/08/2020 20:19
Odachi held high above his head, Ryuzuko's sword begins to radiate a blue glow, with small traces of lightning bolting around the blade. He readjusts his grip, takes a small step back with his right leg, taking a deep, calm, breath. He then bursts his back leg up and forward, at the same time bringing the massive weapon even higher into the air, while shouting "Kamigami no kaminari de!" The weight of the blade comes crashing down on the creature with with all his might, in a crackling smash. The blade cut clean through its side before smashing into the floorboards, the radiant light now dissipated into the monster's side, searing its flesh. The powerful blow left a festering wound on the creature, visibly scaring it.
TheOrsini 02/08/2020 06:45
As she notes her strikes not causing it injury, Koide decides to focus on her defense - watching the creatures hypnotic sway, and readies herself against any attack it might try.
Dandiil {Takumi} 02/08/2020 12:23
Takumi continues his assault on the face with the staff, even though the attacks are not as impressive as his first strike. The half-elf deftly side steps an attack, The double thud in quick succession against the top and side of the snake like head follows. He isn't sure if this round of attacks is doing too much, but continues with the flurry and flare of his spinning staff.
Cel 02/08/2020 15:41
Staying far from the creature, Aralynn prepares another ball of light, this time channeling more energy into it in the hopes that lt will kill the creature, or at least cause it to return to its hole. She releases the attack, bashing the head with a beam of radiant light, burning its flesh and lighting it up for further attacks.
Kyle [Arcadian] 02/08/2020 17:28
The hydra roars furiously. It's a bestial cry full of rage and frustration and hunger. A long serpentine tongue snakes forth from its mouth and a haunting, wailing tone begins to- Koide, Ryuzuko, Takumi and Viraj stand together around the edge of a gaping hole in the floor. A trail of blood leads away into the darkness.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 02/08/2020 17:42
"Sadao!!" Ryuzuko shouts at the human taking cover among some of the barrels and crates. "If you still have a way to write, write down that we need to follow the trail of blood!" Ryuzuko knew they had to act fast record the encounter, or lose any recollection of it. With a swift, hard, swing, Ryuzuko shoots most of the blood off his odachi, the rest he rubs off with a nearby cloth. Putting it back on his weapon rack, he sets himself back to finding a cart to assist in carrying some of the barrels down the tunnel.
Dandiil {Takumi} 02/08/2020 18:26
Takumi picks up a loose plank of floorboard and haphazardly carves into it with his dagger. 'Blood, Tunnel, Follow, Monster" He knows that he and the team just fought something, but the image of the creature is fading quickly. He hands the piece of wood to Ryuzuko. He then makes his way to his pack, and collects his rope and hook from the other tunnel, hanging the rope to the side of his pack. With a light grunt, he lifts his pack to his shoulder. And returns to the melee group. "Are we going after ... Uhhh... That?" (edited)
Mike 03/08/2020 08:00
Sadao crouches back behind the crate. He fumbles a bit, taking too long to notch another arrow. Right when he gets it ready, and pops out with the bow drawn... there's nothing to shoot at. "Hahâ€”huh?" He lowers his bow a bit, then, in fragments, he remembers: he was about to shoot a monster... the one from the article, the thing they were supposed to blow up, the hydra! He just couldn't remember what it looked like, or what had happened to it. As Ryuzuko calls, he grabs the quill and uncorks the vial of ink in his pocket, writing Je'dahnian characters on his arm: Follow blood, explode monster Looking up, he sees Takumi has done the same, albeit with wood. He nods to him. "Yeah, and I get the feeling we'd better hurry. That blood is still fresh. You guys already brought the black powder down there, right?" Now and then, he glances at the ink on his arm, as if to reaffirm its message.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 03/08/2020 17:29
Viraj is ready to strike out, but suddenly finds his target isn't there. Confused, he looks around to the others standing at the edge of the hole with him and then back down inside. Did we kill it...? No, there would be remains... He notices the large trail of blood leading down into the tunnel. What were we trying to kill...? He bangs a fist against his head to jar the memory loose. Hearing the others discuss helps him recall the events. "It will be easy to follow that," he states, pointing to the spilt blood of the creature. "We need to find a way to move the powder down to it's lair. But I cannot shift to make moving a cart easier." He rubs his salt-and-pepper beard and looks to the dragonborn. "I imagine the two of us can pull a cart if we found one." (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 03/08/2020 20:21
Shrouded by cobwebs in the shadows of one of the warehouse's walls, Ryu finds a simple hand-drawn cart.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 03/08/2020 20:30

He carefully manuvers the cart into the tunnel, then starts stacking some of the barrels onto it. "Hopefully this thing is small enough for this to hurt it," he thinks to himself, having now forgotten that they just encountered one of its heads, which would have given a good indication of its size. Dandiil {Takumi} 03/08/2020 20:45

The sandy sound of the powder scraping and moving against the wooden barrel. "See ... Easy, rolling them uphill may take a bit more effort." (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 03/08/2020 23:17

Dandiil {Takumi} 04/08/2020 02:13

He rolls up his sleeves, and with both hands on it, attempts to roll a barrel slowly through the tunnel, following the bloody trail.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 04/08/2020 20:34

Kyle [Arcadian] 04/08/2020 22:43

Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 04/08/2020 23:10

TheOrsini 06/08/2020 09:15

Dandiil {Takumi} 06/08/2020 09:40

He looks down his robes to see if he can start the cleaning process now, but... He doesn't see any blood. He looks back and forth in the mirror to his clothes. "This is maddening" Takumi says, a hint of frustration in his voice. He picks up his bag. Shakes his head, and walks next to Viraj, mirror in one hand, staff in the other. "I'll keep the rear watch." TheOrsini 06/08/2020 10:51

Kyle [Arcadian] 06/08/2020 22:40
Koide recovers her mirror and, after a short walk down the tunnel, the six of them come to the same junction that Viraj discovered earlier. (edited)
TheOrsini 07/08/2020 03:48
"Which way...." Koide muses aloud. She looks to the dirt trying to determine which tunnel was most recently disturbed.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 07/08/2020 05:53

Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 07/08/2020 06:14
"Looks like we have our heading then." Ryuz says, before beginning down the tunnel Viraj suggested.
Mike 07/08/2020 08:07

TheOrsini 07/08/2020 08:14
"It is known. It is better to have and not need than to need and not have." Koide quotes an ancient Jedahnian philosopher. Following along the tunnel along side of Ryu, she occasionally uses the mirror to look for the creature ahead but the reflection is murky from the shadows. Instinctively, she continues to look for signs of the creature as they progress down the dark tunnel. In the back of her mind, she was worried. How big is this thing?
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 07/08/2020 08:16
"The note I wrote for myself said this thing is massive, we may, or we may not, have enough to deal with it. We can only hope for the former." Ryuz answers to Sadao's comment.
TheOrsini 07/08/2020 08:24
"That's useful anyway. This picture from the book doesn't have frame for its size." Koide pulls the rolled noted out from her inner pocket.
Mike 07/08/2020 08:39
"Wait, that sounds familiar." Sadao stops for a moment, propping up the cart with his back, and digs through his pack, finding the note he also wrote for himself in the library, along with the messages he wrote intended for the others. "...Right, 'considerable size'... Wait, that means we've seen it already, haven't we? I can't actually remember what it looks like..." He closes his eyes, as if trying to visualize it, but to no avail. "...Damn. This thing definitely needs to go if it can mess with our heads to that level." He resumes his work.
TheOrsini 07/08/2020 08:46
"Yeah its like this mirror. I feel stupid looking in the darkness through the mirror, but I keep remember to check like its important." Koide sighs in frustration. "It's like I know it helps, but why or how I don't get."
Cel 07/08/2020 17:01
"If this creature was able to do this much, we cannot rule out the fact that it could have lured us down here. Even the memories we do keep could be false, or at the very least modified." Aralynn looks around the group, observing everyone as they continue their way further down. "I am not saying that we should turn back, but at the very least be ready for an ambush. For all I know, we could have already been ambushed earlier."
Dandiil {Takumi} 07/08/2020 22:42
Takumi searches his memories as he holds the mirror out between himself and Viraj, so that they can both see behind. "No, our memories aren't changed, they're removed. I distinctly remember coming down here to move the barrels. I remember Koide calling out to Viraj. I prepared a spell on my staff, and running up the hole..." He trails off a moment... "The next thing I remember is handing Ryu a piece of wooden plank... For some reason. I think this thing, whatever it is, is leaving holes in our memory and in our view of the world. What did I hand you Ryu?" (edited)
TheOrsini 08/08/2020 07:21
"It has to die." Koide said firmly. If group caught the dark reflection in the mirror her serious, grim tone might have betrayed her seething mood. "And should we ever uncover that someone is actually behind this thing attacking the city, I will relish greatly in slitting their throat." Some of her delights were considered distasteful, even among the order, but of course she never offered to those who wouldn't approve. She knew her magician companion had his own appetites, but it would be rude to flaunt them in front of the others. Besides she was merely rooting evil out at its heart. 'The big horrid creatures were not always the worst monsters out there.' (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/08/2020 07:32
"A wooden plank, Takumi, but I was too concerned with finding a cart quickly, that I did not read it." Ryuz says reluctantly. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 08/08/2020 17:57
The tunnel descends ever deeper underground, continuing on until it is sure that they must have travelled some distance from the docks. In the reflection of her mirror, Koide sees only shadows and darkness, briefly illuminated in the dancing lights provided by Sadao. She's so preoccupied hunting for an unknown enemy sneaking up on the group that she only just in time realises that the tunnel ends abruptly at a precipice, emerging into a larger cavern. A few loose rocks tumble down into the chamber with a dull clatter.
TheOrsini 08/08/2020 23:39
"Woah. Hold." Koide says in a rush to avoid getting bumped over the edge. She looks at the cavern and back to the group. "This could be a problem."
Dandiil {Takumi} 09/08/2020 00:42
Takumi looks away from the mirror before stumbling to a stop, barely missing the side of the cart. He makes his way up to Koide, and stands beside the human. "That looks like a long way down..." The half elf digs in his cloak pockets for a small bag. He pulls out a handful of steel balls and before tossing them, he turns to Koide... "Count until you hear a sound." He tosses the bearings into the crevasse, counting to himself, while listening for the confirmation of the balls hitting something.
TheOrsini 09/08/2020 01:12
Koide follows her companion's lead and counts as the ball plummets into the depths.
Kyle [Arcadian] 09/08/2020 07:47
Just a second latter, the ball bearing can be heard to ping against stone.
Kyle [Arcadian] 09/08/2020 10:09
Takumi peers over the edge and sees a rocky 15 foot drop, at the bottom of which the remains of a smashed barrel of gunpowder are scattered. The tunnels so far have been of hard-packed dirt - the earth upon which the town itself has been built. However, this deep underground the soil finally begins to give way to patches of rock and stone. The cavern is broad and circular with multiple tunnels exiting it in several directions. In the centre, a small pool of water wells up in the middle of a sprawling bed of damp earth. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 09/08/2020 20:43
"heh, I guess I'm still not used to my vision down here. My depth perception was way off. It's not too much of a drop." He sets his bag down and is preparing to attach the hook to the side. He takes a moment setting the curled rope on the floor, and retrieves his mirror from his pocket and again notices the blood in the reflection. "I wonder," he whispers and rotates to use the mirror to look into the cavern below. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 10/08/2020 21:29
Pulsing in the heart of the cavern, sprouting up out of the earth like some hideous aberrant potato of grey flesh, Takumi sees the enormous, bulbous body of the false hydra distorted in the poorly polished surface of his little steel mirror. Five thick trunk-like appendages extend out from the body. Most lead off and away up through holes to the surface, but one lurks low near the centre of the cavern, blood slowly dripping from wounds in its neck. It's gaping maw hangs open as it sings. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 10/08/2020 21:38
"Ummm... What is that?" He taps Koide on the shoulder, signaling the mirror. "Guys" Takumi points over his shoulder, "I think I found our creature"
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 10/08/2020 23:01
Viraj peers over Takumi's shoulder. He looks between the mirror and the patch of earth a couple of times. Keeping his voice low he says to the others. "One of those heads was pretty tough to hack through. Are we ready to take on all five of them?" He starts to unload the barrels from the cart and set them near the edge of the dropoff. (edited)
Mike 10/08/2020 23:10
"Wait, don't point at it!" Sadao whispers, just loudly enough for the party to hear. For a second, he can't really explain why that was a bad idea, he just knew. But when he leans over to take a quick look at it through the mirror, recognition floods his mind. Wait, that's what it looks like?! Is his first thought upon seeing it, followed by a sense of deja vu. Regardless, he was now more sure in what little knowledge they had about the creature. "Nobody acknowledge it at all. It hates that more than anything. We should put the mirrors away... and get more barrels."
Mike 10/08/2020 23:52
Sadao writes one last note to himself on his other arm while he can still see the aberration. Fill the chamber at the end of the blood trail with explosives, then detonate. All is well. He then looks away from the reflection, closes his eyes, and counts down from ten, mouthing the numbers. He listens deep to the environment around him, letting the hydra's song in, and letting his memories of it fade into the corner of his mind. By the time he reopens his eyes, he has assumed a casual, even relaxed stance, and speaks in a normal voice. "Well, whatever was supposed to be here, isn't. Let's finish what we've got to do and get out of here."
Cel 11/08/2020 23:30
Confused and paranoid due to the nature of her unseen foe, Aralynn turns around to face the group. "The town was already in a bad place before we got here. I hope it can recover from whatever is causing this." Taking a few steps towards where they came from, she turns to face Sadao. "You are right, we should gather more powder, I do not wish to fight this creature if I cannot picture it in my mind" (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 12/08/2020 03:30
Viraj finishes unloading the casks to powder. "Yes, work to do..." He begins to adjust the cart for the return trip to the surface. What was it that we were trying to blow up. He grunts in frustration, but that soon fades being one that can find satisfaction in physical labor. "Who's coming back up with me?" (edited)
TheOrsini 12/08/2020 08:44
'So close and yet so far.' Koide thinks knowing that they are discussing the hydra's presence in the cavern below them. She clings to the mirror but the darkness doesn't reflect the creature, and its silent song begins its work once again. 'Must kill it.' the hunter thinks in frustration. "Everyone." Koide says realizing the simple truth, "We can't separate." She says as she being to help push the cart.
Dandiil {Takumi} 12/08/2020 08:54
Takumi tucks his mirror into a pocket and prepares for the return journey. The presence of the creature fades quickly from his memory, along with the sense of urgency to collect more barrels. 'who knows how much farther we need to go to find this unknown threat' Takumi begins speaking in hushed tones, so that the caverns don't produce much of an echo. "I agree with Koide, but Is now the time to go get more? We can lower the cart and barrels down, and keep going until we get close to whatever it is we're looking for. Then would probably be a good time to suggest returning." He returns to his knees and begins uncoiling his rope. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 12/08/2020 20:00
"Lets get moving then, the longer we are here, the more likely it will notice us.". Ryuz says to the group before pulling the cart back up the tunnel.
Mike 12/08/2020 20:07

Dandiil {Takumi} 13/08/2020 02:57
Takumi coils his rope back up, and hangs it from the spot on his pack. "I'm right behind you..." 'Yeah, this may be the best place to draw the creature, whatever it is.' He throws his pack over his shoulder. The half elf follows the rest of the group up the corridor. He struggles with the weight of the pack going uphill. For some reason, he finds himself constantly looking over his shoulder. 'Why aren't we looking for it? Koide knows what she's doing, even if I don't understand the method. She's proven that.' Kyle [Arcadian] 13/08/2020 19:52

Kyle [Arcadian] 13/08/2020 22:38
Ryuz turns and sees the head of the false hydra slowly rising from behind the drop. Its empty eyes meet his gaze and it rushes towards him!
TheOrsini 15/08/2020 11:08
Her confidence shaken from her first bout with the beast, she instead decides to utilize her intellect instead. She considers the explosive barrels. 'It was the simplest solution after all.' She considered the blast of the gunpowder, the toughness of the creatures hide, and the condition of the walls. 'No, the tunnel would not hold.' Koide looked closer, the tunnel sides were compressed like a worm's. Collapsing the tunnel would have such a little effect on it, and possibly make it more wary of the barrels in the future. The warrior evaluates the situation and her team. Decided, she plants her feet in anticipation of the carts full weight - bracing against the empty cart. "Go Ryu, I got this. All of you. Kill it, and avoid using the barrels for now." She commands. They sometimes kid about her being in charge, but this time, she would fall into the role. (edited)

Cel 15/08/2020 21:17

Mike 15/08/2020 22:04

Speaking Primordial incantations to entreat spirits, he holds out a hand, letting them carry life energy to him, and close his wound. Simultaneously, more spirits, barely visible, divert towards Koide, and surround her for the time being, ready to assist her in her next moves.
Dandiil {Takumi} 16/08/2020 20:58

Sure he has some training, but he prefers to avoid conflict as much as he can, that was always Koide's job. He takes a step to the left and vanishes in a puff of smoke, He reappears next to the firepowder, drops his pack and begins to wrap his rope around a pair of barrels. 'I have to be quick about this'
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 16/08/2020 21:59

His right hand gripping the blade in reverse, Ryuzuko sweeps the blade outwards then up towards the monster. Right before hitting the hydra's head, his right foot shoots forward, adding power to the attack. The blade connects, scarring the creature badly, and as the blade comes down, Ryuz flips his right hand back to a normal grip, preparing for his next strike.
TheOrsini 18/08/2020 15:18
'What is Takumi doing?' Koide wished she had talked it over with her, but she knew he wasn't stupid. She wished she had a crossbow to help out, but her magic wasn't suited for this form of combat. She instead was stuck with the bow, the creature was just out of reach and if she moved, the cart would tumble into her group. As she turned to put her back up against the cart, Koide slid the bow from her back. Her feet set this would be an awkward shot at best, so he drew an arrow from her quiver and centered herself to aim. The clumsiness faded and she feels at one with the bow. She holds a moment longer focusing her ki pouring in part of herself into the arrow. Release. (edited)
Cel 18/08/2020 20:30

Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 18/08/2020 22:18

Mike 19/08/2020 08:20

Seizing the last of the remaining spiritual presence, he banishes it with a burst of light as a distraction, simultaneously rolling away. He is quickly back on his feet, and draws his shortbow once more. As he takes stock of the situation, he sees Aralynn's woeful missed streak of light, and Takumi making preparations with the barrels. He did want him to set them up to blow this head off, hopefully for good, but it would set them at odds with Koide: given what she said, it ran contrary to her own plan, and she seemed sure they could kill it without them. But it's not alone... "Keep an eye out for the other heads!" he calls, as he strides further back. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 19/08/2020 19:03

TheOrsini 28/08/2020 01:49
