It appears only a beast when you fail to recognize the subtleties." Koide was trying to educate without scolding Takumi. It was an extremely easy trap to step into.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 28/08/2020 17:12
"Either way, we should get moving. We have a ways to walk still." Ryuz adds before continuing up the tunnel. He looks at Sadao, "That is always my goal, protection of the weak and unable is something many dragonborn of my kind aspire to." (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 28/08/2020 17:22
Thinking on all the information that was gathered, he concludes that he realizes that he knows nothing about this creature. Takumi nods at Koide, understanding that she knows more about these things than he does. At the slower pace, Takumi moves with the group, lagging behind every once in a while. Constantly glancing over his shoulder to make sure the lizard thing doesn't catch up. On occasion, he exerts himself to keep up with the group. He looks to the dragonborn, unsure if he should speak. "Ryu, I'm sorry for air balling you, I thought you were gonna kill her." The apology lacks sincerity, and the half elf does not wait for a response, "You mentioned that it forced you to attack your friends..." Curiosity is obvious in the boy's eyes. "What did that feel like, to be controlled?" (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 28/08/2020 17:35
Viraj, unlashing his shield from his forearm, steps up behind Ryuzuko. "Yeah, about that." He slaps him in the shoulder with the broken buckler. "You owe me one, huh," he says half-joking. He stuffs it in his bag as they continue along. "Maybe we can find up back in town?" he wonders aloud. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 28/08/2020 17:36
"If she had not dodged my attack... I probably would have killed her." Ryuz says to Takumi, regret still in his voice. "As far how it felt... It felt like I was in a glass box, able to see everything I was doing, but completely unable to act. I just heard a voice in my head say *attack"... And I did, I had to watch as my body did things I would never do." He pauses again, "Thankfully this tunnel is too small for me to move around in effectively. I also am greatly indebted to you, Takumi, if you hadn't struck me, I don't think I ever would have had a chance too free myself of that prison." He then snarls before finishing with "Next time, I will not be controlled."
17:41
------ Speaking to Viraj, "If that thing still lives, I will take a chunk out of its thick hide and have a shield made for you out of it. Barring that, it served you well in deflecting my blade, I will gladly help you get it repaired, or replaced." He replies to the druid. (edited)
Cel 28/08/2020 18:12
Aralynn positions herself as far as she can from Ryuzuko, while still being able to listen to their conversation while following the group. Searching in her bag and quickly getting frustrated at the lack of medicinal supplies, she resigns herself to adressing the group. ''Sorry for interrupting this conversation, but do any of you have medicinal supplies? My wounds are deeper than I first though and I would rather avoid them getting worse by waiting too long to tend to them.''
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 28/08/2020 18:43
Ryuz looks back at Aralynn, while grabbing one of the pouches on his belt. "Here, use mine. It's the least I can do for almost killing you." He says with a forced smile, still regretting his failure as a guardian ronin.
Cel 28/08/2020 19:06
Aralynn considers the proposal for a second, in the end deciding to prioritize her own safety over her suspicions. Carefully stepping over towards Ryuzuko and reaching out to take the kit, wearing a forced smile of her own. ''Thank you.'' creating the same distance as before, she starts looking over the pouch for anything suspicious.
TheOrsini 29/08/2020 10:31
Koide uses the moment, why Ryuz patches up Aralynn to focus herself. She would not have the time to enter a full meditation, but she could recharge a fragment of power from the ambient surround. Feeling that store within her, she lets out a long shallow sigh. (edited)
Mike 29/08/2020 17:35
With renewed lamplight, Sadao watches Aralynn and Ryu's brief interaction, feeling a twinge of pain at seeing trust whittled away. It's not as though the group was all best friends to begin with, but they were certainly better off before. This hydra has to go. He thinks, as he quickens his pace a little more, to get to the surface as fast as possible without breaking into a sprint.
Cel 29/08/2020 19:59
Feeling satisfied that the healers kit is not dangerous, Aralynn finds somewhere to sit and begins tending to her wounds, using her abundant knowledge of medicine and healing to patch up her wounds and to start tending to the deep teeth marks left by the creature. Satisfied with the results, Aralynn returns the pouch to its owner.
TheOrsini 31/08/2020 02:58
"Come, we must go now." Koide prompts Ryuz and Aralynn.
Kyle [Arcadian] 01/09/2020 09:50
After several more minutes of walking, the junction to the other tunnels comes into sight. Three gaping openings extend up and away into darkness.
Dandiil {Takumi} 01/09/2020 10:26
Approaching from behind the party,Takumi looks around, also not knowing which path to take... "Does anyone remember which way we came from?" Without waiting for an answer, the half-elf searches the walls and ground for marks that the barrel he lost would have made in the hard earth. Finding marks on the left side of the tunnel, he raises his hand and points to the right path. Yes, the path on the right is the right way. "Go right, it's the right one... the correct one... I'm sure of it."
TheOrsini 01/09/2020 11:40
Koide heads right leading the group after Takumi remembers the path. "Nice work."
Kyle [Arcadian] 01/09/2020 11:44
A few minutes later the tunnel does indeed open up through the ruined floor of the warehouse. The more perceptive members of the small band can hear shuffling movement and low noises from outside the building.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 02/09/2020 06:03
Viraj begins to look for a place to recover once that have made it back to the warehouse. He lays out his bedroll and sits to to begin to recoup his energy. Normally a room full of explosives is not conducive to relaxation, but the druid seems to pay no heed. After a moment he notices the noise coming from outside. Somewhat annoyed he stands and begins to look around the building. "Does anyone else here that? Movement outside?" he whispers as he moves towards the hole in the wall. (edited)
TheOrsini 02/09/2020 06:06
"I'll check it out with you. Go ahead and rest a moment longer." she says to the others joining Viraj. Koide slings the bow over her shoulder and draws her katana, slowly sneaking to the nearest opening to peer outside. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 02/09/2020 12:30
Koide peers out through the hole in the wall. Night is falling as the moon slowly obscures the sun and outside she can greater numbers of townsfolk wandering the wharf. They seem aimless... maybe even mindless as they stumble about the streets.
Mike 02/09/2020 19:17
"The townspeople, right?" Sadao asks from further inside. "It's like I thought, thenâ€”they're only now starting to wake up. We should warn them of the danger they're in."
Dandiil {Takumi} 02/09/2020 19:21
Takumi comes from behind a crate, having changed from his performance robes into his traveling clothes. After hearing Sadaos comment, he seems confused..."It seems pretty late for the town to start becoming active... isn't it getting close to dusk?"
Mike 02/09/2020 19:34
Sadao smiles a bit, and walks back his statement. "I meant 'wake up' from the hydra's influence. They're not thinking about the time of day. Late or not, they've suddenly been cut off from something that's been deluding them for who knows how long. They must be confused, disoriented..." He heads up to join the two at the hole and see for himself. "They need guidance. I can speak their language. I'll address them." He looks to Koide and Viraj, then back to the others.
TheOrsini 02/09/2020 23:47
"Be on your guard, Sadao. We are still strangers here. They may lash out at us for their missing or dead." Koide yarns.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 03/09/2020 01:15
"Or they could be under the control of that thing still... Like it did to Ryu," Viraj adds, staying nearby in case the worst occurs. (edited)
Mike 03/09/2020 02:45
Sadao nods, heeding their warnings and concerns, but apparently not dwelling on them. He closes his eyes, and focuses momentarily as he reaches to the shamisen on his back, and slowly drags a finger across its strings, letting out a few trailing notes. As they sound, his clothes billow with wind as he rises from the ground, achieving flight. "Don't worry. I'll be right back." He says to the group, before flying out the hole in the wall and up above the streets of Dandong. Scanning the streets first, he touches his neck, creating an illusory sound to amplify and reverb his voice, so more people can hear him. He speaks in Honmin. "People of Dandong! Please, listen! My name is Sadao, of the Huiya Clan of Peacekeepers. My friends and I came here in search of spirits and monsters, that the threats they pose might be quelled. And we found one such monster here, in your town! Look around you!" He flies around and points to the holes and wreckage caused by the hydra's tunneling heads, and then to the graffiti messages left on the town's various walls. "You're seeing the world for what it really is! You've got to leave town!" He pauses to see what effect his words were having on them.
Kyle [Arcadian] 04/09/2020 13:16
Some of the more confused and lost looking residents of Dandong look up at Sadao rising over the buildings of the town in fear and puzzlement. Several others simply shamble in the bard's direction, as though drawn like moths to a flame.
Mike 05/09/2020 07:50
Sadao looks over the horribly confused individuals in the crowd, and a look of despair overtakes his face. Is this what happens when you're under its charm for too long? It breaks your mind? "Gods above..." he mutters, absently. He began to lose hope. If the very people they were trying to rescue were already brain-dead, was there even any point? But just as quickly, he remembers his father's words to him before he accepted his family's treasured Scroll: To bear this is to remain a beacon, through the worst of times. People and spirits alike will look to you, whether they realize it or not. When they do, you must do all you can in their service. Here they were, looking at him, and without really knowing. He grits his teeth and regains his composure. I'll be the beacon. "Whether you understand me or not, follow me! Come on!" he speaks with his doubled voice, before changing the illusory magic to a visual form: an alluring lamplight, not as bright as the ones he used to light up the tunnels, floating in place near him above the heads of the townsfolk. He begins flying at a moderate pace across the streets, intermittently creating this light just behind him and dispelling it, only to conjure it again, in an attempt to attract as many of the dumbstruck people as he can to follow him out of town.
TheOrsini 05/09/2020 10:18
Koide watch on in silence from her vantage point of the ajar door. She reaches for her mirror to glance about with it.
Dandiil {Takumi} 05/09/2020 16:52
Takumi walks up beside Koide, seeming troubled by something. "The town wasn't this active when we arrived earlier in the day, right? Not to mention that there were nearly no people in this area. It is a little late for this many townsfolk to be this far from their homes. At least from what we saw when we came in... Am I wrong with this line of thinking?" He looks through the hole seeing the crowds of people following Sadao. "It all feels... Wrong..."
Cel 05/09/2020 17:30
"What if the creature can do more than we though? Maybe now it plans to control these people and kill us that way?" Aralynn stays towards the back of the group, glancing around frantically for any signs of danger, or any further suspicious behavior from the townsfolk. "Maybe we should leave town, at the very least overnight. We can return tomorow to see if they are still like this, to confirm whether or not they are under its control, but right now we are not safe."
Kyle [Arcadian] 05/09/2020 20:05
The townsfolk begin to follow Sadao along his path, some in a shambling groaning mass that lumbers out in the open, others skirting the edges of the streets, but clearly heeding the bard's words.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 06/09/2020 04:34
Viraj nods in agreement with Takumi. "I don't like this either. I hope he knows what he's doing." He starts to step through the hole to follow. "Maybe getting them out of the town will help end the monster's influence over them...?" He looks back to the rest, before reluctantly saying"But, we can't let him just fly around on his own out there with that thing still lurking about." (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 06/09/2020 04:38
"We don't even know if it is still alive." Ryuz says to Viraj I'm likely to believe it is dead, considering the sudden change in the villagers. Definitely don't let your guard down however. But I think constantly thinking it is still alive, when there is evidence against it, will just make you go paranoid." he says to the group, trying to calm their minds. (edited)
Cel 06/09/2020 15:52
"A little bit of paranoia is a small price to pay for our lives, is it not?" Aralynn quickly scans the crowd again before turning to Viraj, "I agree that we should lead them out of the town, but we should keep an eye out around us while we do for any danger."
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 07/09/2020 03:12
"Better to think that it's not dead until I see it with my eyes," Viraj says before disappearing through the hole in the wall and cautiously following Sadao as he charms the remaining half-conscious denizens of the town. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 07/09/2020 06:09
Takumi looks a bit apprehensive, but concerned. "I'm going to follow them. I don't think I'll be able to sleep tonight whether we're in town or out, though. I definitely don't want to be controlled..." He makes his way out and scans the area for stragglers, he also scans the skyline, watching for any hint of the fearsome beast that they have been trying to deal with. He is forcing the memory of the creature to stay in his head, occasionally replaying the portions of the combat, that he saw, within his mind. Passing a costume shop, the creature vanishes from his mind as he thinks of his blue performance cloak... 'good thing I wasn't wearing my white set, It is going to be hard enough to get blood out of the blue one, maybe I can acquire a new one." He continues forward, thinking of how a new set of clothes would look. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 07/09/2020 10:01
Takumi spots several stragglers whispering fearfully amongst themselves and occasionally pointing up at where Sadao drifts over the rooftops.
Dandiil {Takumi} 07/09/2020 15:39
In a friendly tone, with a smile on his face, Takumi calls to them in Je'dahnian. Making hand movements to help them understand his words. "Come on, we are trying to help. The monster may still be out there. Come, come." He beckons them to join the procession. He repeats the attempt a few times for each small group. Hoping that they get the idea.
Kyle [Arcadian] 07/09/2020 20:21
A few pale faces glance up at Takumi in hope, while others throw fearful glances at the shambling townsfolk who lumber mindlessly after Sadao - but too late. Takumi has caught their attention and a fraction of the 'procession' breaks off, now heading towards the magician. The wave of people moves ever faster as they draw closer to Takumi, stumbling and rasping unnaturally as they go.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 07/09/2020 22:11
Ryuzuko hangs back behind the various groups of people. His eyes watchful for anything amiss in the village, aside from the "zombie" like townsfolk.
Mike 08/09/2020 20:23
Sadao continues to fly overhead, but sees that a portion of his followers have broken off and started pursuing someone else... "Takumi!" He calls out the magician's name, without the aid of magic. He looks down, scanning the crowd for another of the party. "One of you, help him! I can't control themâ€”I don't know what they'll do if they catch him!" For the time being he remains in mid air and keeps the flashing illusion going to occupy the other townspeople, and prevent a bad situation from growing worse.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/09/2020 21:12
Ryuzuko, seeing the shambling townsfolk close in on Takumi, heads towards yhe group. As he gets closer he closes his eyes, tuning his senses to those of the undivine. He senses no presence of undead. However something is not right, so he walks at a brisk pace in order to block the group from Takumi, pulling his shield off his pack. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/09/2020 21:29
Likewise, Viraj hurries to intercept those shambling figures heading towards Takumi. He looks closely as they approach and notices a look in their eyes. He glances to Ryuzuko and back to them again. "Looks like some of these might be controlled like Ryu was! Their eyes are kind of glowing purple!" The man steps up to one of the approaching figures and delivers a quick punch to their nose and watches the strange color fade from their eyes. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 08/09/2020 21:30
Takumi reacts to his name being called, and scans for the source. Spotting Sadao, and then the crowd of people closing in on him... 'Well that worked, now what?' Takumi, still feeling a little off about the whole situation, grips his quarterstaff while his mind runs through options. 'I could lead them towards the group' as Ryu appears, shield at the ready... 'ok group is coming to me' "uhh..." Takumi's mind runs through a few other options. "Ryu, what's going on? Do you think they're being controlled? I was kinda waving my hands around trying to get people to follow, maybe they just want to join us." "viraj... uhh...Oh balls" (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 08/09/2020 21:32
"Looks like that worked," Viraj grins. "No more purple eyes on this one." Then to the man he just delivered a punch to, "Sorry about that, but something had your mind." He motions to the man's head knowing he likely doesn't understand his words. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 09/09/2020 10:05
The man sways and staggers clearly confused, he stares at Viraj and his companions in fear and bolts towards the edge of the street. Meanwhile, the rest of the bewitched townsfolk begin to close in on them...
Cel 11/09/2020 03:28
"I told them!" Aralynn says to herself angrily. ""They can get themselves killed all they want, but at least I have some self preservation." Aralynn finds the nearest street corner, as far from other people as she can, and hides behind it, keeping an eye on the crowd.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 11/09/2020 23:06
Viraj steps back as the man runs off, but the remaining small horde of townsfolk continue to draw nearer. "I'm going to try to slow these people down and then we can try to circle around to get ahead of all them!" He waves his open hand toward the feet of those that are approaching . "Scroagh cassey," he says in the strange language of druids, and then begins to draw his arm back as if to pull something from the ground. Roots and vines spring forth beneath and wrap around the feet of all but one of the townfolk. "That should keep them from coming after you," he says to Takumi as he starts toward the street intersecting the one Sadao is leading everyone down. "Let's get going!" (edited)
TheOrsini 12/09/2020 07:01
Seeing the encroaching mass of people, Koide decides a passive solution is not a likely one. She could knock them out safely. She utters the words of her hunter's mark at the nearest man - dressed like an innkeeper, she notes the satchel over his shoulder and his tired eyes. With the mirror not revealing the creature, she slides into her belt pouch and fluidly returns the katana to is sheath. She pushes the door wider - ready to dash, her legs coiled like a spring. She was not ready yet, but if they cut off her companions she would be the back up plan. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 12/09/2020 13:26
Takumi approaches a pair of gentlemen and knowing that hitting them may break them free of control, he wades through the entangling vines and swings a little harder than he intended at the leg of the nearest one, hearing the smack of his staff against the back of his knee. "Oh man I didn't mean to hit you that hard I'm sorry" Takumi apologizes quickly as he puts the tip of the staff into the top of the neighboring man's foot. The pair of them don't seem to be changing their mannerisms as did the one that Viraj punched. Takumi calls back to the group. "It's not working"
Kyle [Arcadian] 13/09/2020 13:36
As Sadao drifts over the city, the crowd following him steadily grows. Townsfolk emerge from buildings in all directions, some mindlessly pursuing the flying bard, while others cautiously watch from the shadows. Down on the ground, those near Viraj fight and tear at their bonds in an effort to reach the druid and his companion. Some manage to break free, while others are held in place by the lashing vines. Those that reach the object of their wrath last about wildly, but only one manages to make contact - a burly looking man who slams Viraj in the side.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 13/09/2020 17:31
Ryuzuko quickly scans the tops of the buildings for any sign of the hydra. Seeing nothing there, he moves over to the closest townsperson and bashes him in the side with his shield. The glow fading from the man's eyes, the strike having rattled him enough to shake the influence of the hydra. I see the sign of the hydra! Keep an eye out for it so that we may stop this at the source!. He then turns his head, his open hand pointing at him, to the man he just hit If you want to save your town, either knock your fellow townsman awake, search for a large "snake-like" monster, so we may take it out. Or, if you are a coward, leave this town now!
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 14/09/2020 22:28
Seeing even more townsfolk coming down the street, Viraj retreats back to Takumi's side to protect him. He draws back halfway and delivers a sidearm strike to the stomach of one of them, and follows through to connect with the the person next to them. He grunts in disappointment as the purple within their eyes doesn't extinguish from his first strike, but the second person comes to their senses. He gives them a nod to move along. "Maybe we should get off the streets before this gets any worse...? Back to the warehouse?" (edited)
TheOrsini 16/09/2020 12:18
Koide dashes from her spot barreling for innkeeper. Unsure of how hard to strike these people to snap them out of their stupor, she gives her full fury into a punch to the gut. It seems unfazed trying to grab as she bounds from its grasp. She could tell she'd hurt him, but it wasn't stopping the man either. Though unpracticed in recent days in this fighting, her body seems to recall perfectly. She considers tripping this woman nearby, and as she goes into a spinning kick, the blow goes high and into the thigh. By some strange occurrence, she doesn't seem to respond to the attack either other than the glazed purple gaze. She considers her sword for moment, but decides to give it another go before summoning a bloodbath. She readies herself for the next barrage of attacks, bringing her arms high in a defensive posture. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 16/09/2020 15:22
Realising that the party wasn't getting very far with the possessed villagers, Takumi becomes a bit frustrated and wades his way into the largest group of zombies in the area. He slams his staff against the ground, collapsing the air around him in a Thunderous boom that echoes off of the nearby structures. The shockwave spreads from him, causing only 3 out of the 6 people around him some distress. Noticing one of his party among them, Takumi quickly apologizes to Viraj. Only 1 of the villagers seems to break free of the brainwashing, and Takumi suddenly realizes his mistake... "Um, guys, we better hide!" Takumi gestures toward the large group that is following the floating Sadao. "Uhhh... Now" Takumi spots an open door, and takes a step towards it, vanishing in a rising mist. He appears in the doorway, and takes a step back into the building, taking note of the contents.
Kyle [Arcadian] 17/09/2020 15:10
The man who Ryuzuko is yelling at stares at the dragonborn with wild eyes and moments later Takumi's thunderclap echoes cacophonously about the narrow street, sending him running for the edge of town. A score or more of the bewitched Honmin at the rear of the train following Sadao turn towards the source of the racket, their attention clearly drawn by the thunderous noise. Slowly, a group breaks off, steadily lumbering back in that direction. Close by, two more of the townsfolk break free from the druid's spell and those who remain under the hydra's sway swing wildly at Koide, Ryu and Viraj. Fortunately the few blows that land fail to deal any damage through armour. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 17/09/2020 22:01
Ryuzuko bashes another villager, who does not wake from the power controlling him, and he again scans the buildings for any signs of the hydra, atill to no avail.
Cel 19/09/2020 19:59
Aralynn stays in hiding, now looking around for any sighting of the hydra. Not seeing it, she starts to plan out her next actions.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 21/09/2020 17:48
"Come on! Let's get off the road. We have more turning this way," Viraj tugs on Koide's sleeve as he turns to find a suitable place to try to wait out the mindless horde. He sees Takumi in a nearby doorway and head in that direction. He waits just outside the door to ensure the others follow.
TheOrsini 22/09/2020 07:45
Coming from her blind spot, Koide nearly swings on Viraj as the druid pulls at her clothes. She then notices why, 'We are being overrun.' She opens her mind to the ebb of battle readying to avoid any strike or grabs of the nearby foes as she follows behind Viraj as quickly as possible.
Dandiil {Takumi} 22/09/2020 16:24
Takumi seeing Viraj following his lead, finds a place to hide beneath the staircase. How badly that went for him, he starts Internally Reprimanding himself for being so silly as to think that he could make so much noise without them noticing.
Kyle [Arcadian] 23/09/2020 10:36
Two of the townsfolks swing wildly at Koide as she retreats, but she she ducks away with ease and is soon safely inside the the building with Takumi and Viraj. However, Ryu remains alone outside on the street. Another of those caught by Viraj's spell tears themselves free and five of the locals swarm the dragonborn, grabbing him from all sides.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 23/09/2020 21:51
"These are some tenacious townsfolk" Ryuz thinks to himself as the locals grab him. Having manage to free his arm enough to cast, he shouts out "Chirasu!" and with a loud crack, echoing throughout the town, sends a thunderous wave from himself. The wave impacts the townsfolk grappling him, sending one of them flying and the concussive force is enough to shake them all free of control. They immediately let go of Ryuzuko, grasping their heads in pain from the spell. Ryuzuko, having made a gap for himself, heads towards Koide, still keeping a watchful eye on the remaining controlled townsfolk. "We need to find the source!" he shouts out to his companions.
Cel 24/09/2020 13:10
Seeing the group free themselves, Aralynn quickly scans the area. Seeing that she should be able to make it to them safely, she runs out of her hiding spot and makes a dash for the door. "We have just escaped the Hydra, we are in no shape to return there today, especially not with the possibility of getting followed by the townsfolk." After pausing to listen to the commotion outside, she continues. "Unless we think we can snap all of them out of its control, we should get out of town. Better to leave its range than to have one of us fall under its control."
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 24/09/2020 16:54
"We're going to have to sit tight here for a bit until the road is less crowded. Maybe they will just go away if they can't get to us?" Viraj quickly pulls a nearby cupboard to block a window. "Our friend is going to have to be on his own for a bit... I hope he knows what he's doing." He then continues to move the larger pieces of furniture to barricade the door.
Mike 24/09/2020 18:54
"I hope this works." Sadao mutters to himself, as he continues to soar above the crowd. Continuing on, he tries to lead them as far as he can out of town, hoping to bring them far enough away from the hydra that they might snap out of it.
Kyle [Arcadian] 25/09/2020 13:30
Soon after Viraj blocks the door it begins to shake and rattle as those on the other side pound against it. Individually, they are weak. However, slowly but surely the wood starts to creak and crack under the force of the combined effort. Outside, the majority of the entranced townsfolk are still following Sadao inland. The bard's following has grown significantly, with citizens streaming out of buildings from all over town. Not long later the first leave Dandong, as Sadao ventures out beyond the last of the urban buildings and into the countryside. Looking back, his plan seems to be working! The front most of the locals are clutching at their heads and staring about in confusion as the purple glow fades from their eyes. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 25/09/2020 20:25
"That isn't going to hold them for much longer. We should move." Viraj grunts having to move on so soon and proceeds to the back door. He opens the door just enough to stick his head through and take a look at their path ahead.
Kyle [Arcadian] 25/09/2020 20:26
Out the back of the house, Viraj spies a scared-looking group of people cowering in an inner court. They do not appear to have any trace of purple in their eyes.
Mike 25/09/2020 20:49
"Just keep following me, and don't look back." Sadao eases the confused people in Honmin, as they start to wake up. He continues on, to get the rest of the people back to normal.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 26/09/2020 15:49
Viraj gives the people a reassuring nod and signals to keep quiet and then ducks back inside. "It's all clear out there except for a few of the townsfolk hiding out there... They don't appear to be under the control of the monster," he adds. Hearing the wood strain against the pressure again quickens his pace. He pushes the door open further. "Do we we want to just make a run for it, or are we going quiet?" (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 26/09/2020 20:08
Takumi hears the all clear, and comes out of hiding making his way to the back door. "I like the quiet exit but we can't take too long... That thing may come back out." He looks at the scared townsfolk... And in a hushed tone "What are we doing with them? I wanna say we leave them, but..."
TheOrsini 27/09/2020 03:46
"I worry that Sadao is about confirm my fears. If they lose the psychotic rage once they leave the city, then it is a defense mechanism of the beast, and... that also indicates that it is still alive." Koide says in an ominous report.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 27/09/2020 18:38
Viraj looks back out to the helpless people and then to the door where the mindless townsfolk are sure to break in soon. "They can follow along, I guess." He shrugs his massive shoulders. "Which way are we going - after Sadao?" (edited)
TheOrsini 29/09/2020 12:59
"No, he gave us an opportunity, let's take it. With most of the rabble gone, we can try and finish this thing." Koide strategized.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 29/09/2020 14:43
"Those people were never a problem. Just like flies buzzing," Viraj replies. "At least three of those heads left and I have spent most of my magic. And she looks like she's about to fall over," he points to Aralynn cowering in a corner. "One of its heads was enough. I'm not going against that thing again until I've had a chance to properly rest." (edited)
TheOrsini 29/09/2020 15:26
"We basically have two choices: push through and try to kill this thing or get away. It's not gonna be safe enough to rest near this thing. If it gets enough time to recover, it'll start blocking our memories again, or whatever it does, and we will be back in the same way we were before now." Koide looks to Takumi and Ryuz. "What are you're thoughts? My blade is not effective against its hide."
Dandiil {Takumi} 30/09/2020 01:20
"I'm good with either choice, but if we leave these people to their fate, they are as good as dead." Takumi lowers his head and looking to the scared townsfolk cowering nearby. "I'm voting get away. These people may never go back to normal after what they've endured, so I hate to say it.." he lowers his voice to a whisper, "... But it would probably be more of a kindness to leave them to die. We are also not well prepared for a creature of this size either." (edited)
TheOrsini 30/09/2020 05:38
"No half measures, then. We are to abandon them to their fate." Koide half questions, "Say it Ryuz, and we shall be about it. No dishonor in knowing you're outmatched." (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 30/09/2020 05:44
Ryuzuko looks at Takumi with a look of mild disgust at the mention of leaving people to die "If we leave, the creature will recover and just torment another town. It's definitely desperate, taking over the townsfolk as a last ditch effort to same itself," he says to the half-elf. "I will not let this thing roam free while we have a chance to end this madness. We cornered and injured it, we just need to find it," he proclaims loudly, with an extremely determined expression. "There is still an entire warehouse of gunpowder for us to utilize!" he yells, pointing in the direction of the port. He takes a moment to collect himself. Looking towards the huddled group cowering, "we have an opportunity to save this town. Most of the townsfolk have been guided out by Sadao, those that are left seem to go after whoever they deem to be the greatest threat." he tries to plead with his comrades. "We can try to rest, but it cannot be for long and cannot be here." he suggests to the group "No where is safe in this town, we need to get as many people as we can out, maybe even convince any who are able to join us." he sighs "But... we need to deal with this threat NOW, or this thing will continue to destroy other towns just like this."
TheOrsini 30/09/2020 05:54
"Good," Koide has a sly smile on her lips. She anticipated the dragonborn's response, and she agreed with it. "Then no more of this. You can get on your feet and help us... or lay there until you can." The monster slayer avoided her typical threat of killing the weakest member of her party. The priest was indeed a liability so far, barely aware of her surroundings. But it was not that kind of time or place. Besides, it would only serve to divide the party further.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 30/09/2020 06:10
"I want to see this hidden trespasser dealt with as well." Viraj nods in agreement with Ryuzuko. "Just a short time to recover some of my abilities is all I need," he adds eagerly. "Let's go find Sadao before they bust down that door." The man steps out the door and tries to signal to those gathered in the courtyard that they should not stay here. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 30/09/2020 16:24
"That's a relief, I actually thought you guys might actually agree with me," Takumi looks relieved, "Let's get these people out of here, get a moment of rest to formulate a plan, and come destroy this thing. There is one thing though, what if Koide's theory about the people leaving town and being released is true, and the "thing" pushes harder on the minds of those within town, everyone that we're helping, including our own party could come under the influence of that creature at any moment. In other words, We should take the most direct path from town, gathering as many people as we can, brainwashed or not." Takumi shoulders his pack and attempts to help the scared townsfolk to their feet.
Kyle [Arcadian] 30/09/2020 16:27
One man rises from amidst the bunched up townsfolk and approaches Viraj and Takumi. "What is happening? Where can we go?" He asks, bewildered.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 01/10/2020 17:30
Viraj shrugs, not understanding the man's words. "Let's go," he calls to the rest of the group and gives a wave to the man and the others gathered in the courtyard that they should follow. He begins moving in the direction where it seemed Sadao was leading the rest of the townsfolk he gathered. (edited)
TheOrsini 02/10/2020 05:07
Koide has a gut instinct that this would not go so easily; she draws her katana as she moves. She wiped the blade clean with her skirt, using the sword as a deterrent against being rushed and the reflection in Ha to see any of the creatures' invisible heads. She is right next to Viraj as they leave, not saying a word. Trying to keep the elf out her head. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 04/10/2020 03:42
"All right then." Ryuzuko says, he takes position in the rear of the entourage keeping an eye on their rear. He was happy to hear that they would not in fact leave the townsfolk to die, "Now to find this thing and finish it off" he thought to himself. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 07/10/2020 21:26
As Sadao heads further and further past the edges of Dandong, ever more townsfolk come to their senses, until the bard forced to alight and is left surrounded by a confused and scared group of the town's shivering citizens.
Mike 07/10/2020 22:23
Sadao gradually descends to the ground as the magic wears off, but looks around at the group of citizens now finally free of the hydra's charms with satisfaction. He climbs up on a nearby stump to address them properly in Honmin. "Everybody, stay calm. Up until now, you've been the prey of a creature called a false hydra. This man-eating aberration can charm anyone that hears its song, lulling them into a false sense of security, and making its victims forget it even exists. Your mental statesâ€”and the hydra's colossal sizeâ€”can only mean that it has been here, hiding under Dandong, for a long time. You're probably going to need some time to recover, so sit down and let your heads clear." As if to demonstrate, he sits down cross-legged on the stump. He puts a hand to his chest and bows his head, giving them a wholesome grin as he introduces himself. "My name is Sadao, of Clan Huiya. Nice to finally meet you for real. My friends and I specialize in this sort of thing, handling monsters that threaten folk like yourselves. The first thing we wanted to do was evacuate you guys before the hydra could hurt anymore of you. They should be on their way now."
Kyle [Arcadian] 08/10/2020 08:26
Sadao's honeyed words certainly seem to reassure many of the escaped Honmin that they are being helped, but in other ways the talk of the False Hydra also only raises further questions. Nevertheless, the tone is muted and people simply begin to huddle together under the trees for shelter in the cold and dark. Across town, Koide and her companions stick to the back streets, followed by the scared group of townsfolk from the residential court. Hurrying through the shadows, they skirt the larger groups of the possessed as they head in the direction that they have seen Sadao fly. Ryuzuko tries hard to match his friend's efforts, but before long the jingling and scraping of metal on metal from his armour attracts the attention of some of the stragglers. Fortunately, Aralynn is able to distract them with a thaumaturgical burst of noise from another direction and the group escape without further problems. Several minutes later they meet Sadao on the outskirts of Dandong. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 09/10/2020 23:18
"Good job," Viraj says approaching Sadao. "I think we're going to rest a bit and then head back in there to take care of this thing." He looks back to the group just to confirm. "Do you think any of these people know anything we don't know already?"
Mike 10/10/2020 01:01
"Not likely, they still seem confused about all of this. At least they're staying put, though." He looks out over the people, a hint of worry in his eyes. It vanishes as he chuckles, folding his arms. "I gotta say, I didn't picture my first day back in Hong going quite like this." "I'll just say, if it seems like that thing is still too much for us, I think we should focus on evading, and evacuating as many more people as possible."
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 10/10/2020 01:15
Ryuz sighs at Sadao's suggestion, "You were not there, but we decided that saving this town is the only true course of action. If we just leave with as many townspeople as we can, they would need to find a new home and..." he pauses. "This abomination will recover and torment another town. It is injured and obviously afraid for it's life, now is the time to kill it" Ryuzuko looks to the huddled people "Maybe if we can convince some of them to help, we stand a better chance. Even if it's just moving powder barrels so we may use them against this thing again." Now looking towards Sadao "You are our only reliable way of communication with the people of this country. Do you think you could ask for any able-bodied men to help save their town?" (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 10/10/2020 15:45
Takumi looks at the numerous people huddled together. "Ryu, I don't think that would work. What if that thing takes their minds again? It would only cause us more problems. You of all people know the strength of will this thing has when it is under attack. Yet, I can't think of any better options." Takumi lies back, using his pack as a pillow. Trying to think of something else that might assist the coming conflict.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 10/10/2020 16:56
"I'm sure not everyone is ready to wait in hiding." Viraj shrugs his pack off and removes the broken buckler strapped to it. "Find out if one of them can point us to the armorer. I'm needing a new one of these." He lets the shield fall the ground. "If they don't want to risk their necks directly, see if they can point us to any other supplies that any of the remaining merchants have have on hand that we could use to save their town." The druid then begins to to prepare a small campfire from which to draw his energy from while he recovers.
Mike 10/10/2020 20:00
Sadao looks on at the people, noticing a small family in particular. The daughter was latching onto her mother, complaining about how her head hurt, while her father held them both close. "I'm with Takumi there. These people finally got a chance to live their lives again. Sending them back at the beast is... asking a lot right now. But I'll ask about the other stuff." He speaks to the townsfolk. "We'll be heading back to deal with the monster soon. Are any of you skilled with smithing? We have some gear that needs repair. Also, does anyone know of anything in town that could help us in a fight, besides the fireworks in the warehouse? We'll be going up against a giant monster, here." He does an admirable job of making it seem like it wasn't a very big deal. (edited)
Cel 10/10/2020 20:47
Aralynn sits at the campfire, turning to face the group as she suggests "If we are to return soon we need to take away all of its advantages, and that includes the entire population of this town if their minds are taken, so we should have them evacuate the town until it is dead. We should also make some sort of plan to prevent it from making us hurt each other, so I propose we distance ourselves, especially those of us with range, as much as possible to stop attacks before they happen."
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 12/10/2020 15:33
"Why don't you let them decide how much they want to help?" Viraj says as he sits to warm himself.
Cel 12/10/2020 15:37
"But is that worth the risk of them turning again?" Aralynn adds as she inspects her equipment for damage from the last fight.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 12/10/2020 15:51
"If I was trying to get my home back, I would want to do everything I could." (edited)
TheOrsini 12/10/2020 15:53
"This is no time to argue. We can discuss alternatives till we die of old age." Koide knows this isn't getting them anywhere. "The people are more of a liability than an aide. Maybe... maybe with a few weeks of training and something to block their hearing, they could be useful. As it stands I think the priestess is right." It galled the warrior to say that. "Instead, let's discuss our assets. Viraj how much strength do you have left in you?" (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 12/10/2020 16:04
Viraj grunts and shakes his head with irritation. Putting their own weakness on people they don't even know. He snaps a branch in two with his hands and tosses it on the flames. He stares into the flames, finding his center, and lets out a calming breath. "I will be ready after a short rest here," he finally replies.
TheOrsini 12/10/2020 16:05
"Good, what about you, elf?" Koide turns to stare for an answer from Aralynn.
Kyle [Arcadian] 13/10/2020 21:55
A couple of smiths and a leatherworker make themselves known from amongst the escaped locals, offering to take a look at Viraj's shield.
Dandiil {Takumi} 13/10/2020 22:50
"I'll be ready to go after a nap, but I used most of my strength on those barrels. Oh, you mean her, not me, sorry." Takumi chuckles and closes his eyes again, feeling the cool wind running over his body.
Cel 14/10/2020 04:02
"My wounds have been tended to, for the most part. I should also be ready after a short rest." Aralynn turns to the fire and starts inspecting and adjusting the bandages covering the wound on her shoulder.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 14/10/2020 17:58
As the party rests up, Ryuzuko stands on the outer edge of the group, overlooking the town, watching for any signs of the hydra. He spends some of this time praying to his kami for guidance and renewing of strength. His pack on the ground and hands resting on hit odachi planted into the ground still in it's saya "As soon as everyone is ready, we should move while it is still dark. That should help avoid unnecessary encounters with anyone left who is controlled." he says over his shoulder to his companions as he stands guard.
Dandiil {Takumi} 14/10/2020 23:02

The half elf looks at the rescued townsfolk, still huddling together, then out at the town itself. "I've got a pretty good sense of the layout of the town... Life on the streets lets you pick up certain things... we can stay off the main roads and get to where we need to go, fairly easily." (edited)
TheOrsini 18/10/2020 12:53

Kyle [Arcadian] 19/10/2020 06:57
Carried on the wind from the woods to the west, Koide hears the high-pitched tune of a woman's voice singing. "Aah aah, ooh, ooh." (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 19/10/2020 17:17

Mike 20/10/2020 19:26
"He's probably still terrified. He's the only one that can always see the beast. ...Alright, I'm ready to go. Can't help him from out here. Let's look for some kind of opening like Koide said." He casts a glance at the swordswoman, but she seems distracted by something.
TheOrsini 22/10/2020 05:00
"Hmm... sorry... Just the wind." She doesn't sound confident on that, but is caught off guard. "Yeah, we probably should go retrieve him and look for cavern entrances on the way there." Koide takes point moving past the crowds and back into the city, hoping for the others to follow. That sound was so off-putting.
Kyle [Arcadian] 22/10/2020 23:16
The edge of town is eerily quiet as the group pass the outermost buildings. The wind whispers between the walls, kicking up dust clouds in the light of the moon, but no great featureless heads can be seen looming over Dandong.
TheOrsini 23/10/2020 06:13
Koide holds her katana up and gazes into its reflection as they walk.
Dandiil {Takumi} 23/10/2020 07:52
Takumi is guiding Koide and pointing her to the little tricks of maneuvering a town that just come naturally to the half-elf. Strangely enough, travel is actually taking less time than the main streets would have provided. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 23/10/2020 21:01
Koide doesn't spot the reflection of any nearby hydra heads in the glistening blade of her sword. Wherever the monster is, it's not showing itself just yet. With Takumi's skilled guidance, it's not long before the group of warriors arrives outside the town hall. (edited)
TheOrsini 24/10/2020 04:20
"Move together." Koide says, as she pulls the door ajar to glance inside, looking for the burrow the creature had left when it attacked the.... somebody. This hazy memory moments were grating on her nerves.
Kyle [Arcadian] 24/10/2020 10:36
As the town hall draws closer, parts of it seem to flicker in and out of existence. The damage to the walls vanishes and reappears at irregular intervals and gaping holes shimmer in and out of view beneath a twilit façade of normalcy. The door swings open with a creak, or is it well oiled? The wood seems worn and hangs loose on its hinges, or has it only yesterday seen a new coat of paint? The interior is eerily silent and dust hangs in the air, but then a flash of memory pierces the veil in a wave of psychic energy and everyone present hears an abrupt scream that is immediately cut off once more. The wine red edge of a blood stain slowly spreads across the floorboards from the edge of a lightless hole behind the secretary's desk. A gaping black maw leading to the tunnels below.
TheOrsini 24/10/2020 12:08
The image shifted again... she felt a throbbing sensation in her head as if struck by twenty taps from a carpenter's hammer. Koide falters for a moment, leaving Takumi to lead on up the stairwell. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 25/10/2020 04:55
Takumi looks to Koide and the rest of the group before proceeding. He then looks at the hole in the ground that keeps shifting in and out of existence. "I thought we were coming back to destroy this thing, are you sure we want to go up?" The Half-Elf points to the hole "Besides, I don't know which room to look for, I wasn't among you when you came in the first time." Takumi seems unsure of this decision, but trusts in Koide's judgment.
TheOrsini 25/10/2020 05:00
"Ryuz, can you go with him? I feel a bit of sickness with the shifting images. " Koide didn't like showing weakness, but every minute could count here. "Just check on the magister. Sadao, would mind going with them?" Even suffering this pain, she was not willing to give them a weak front against the creature.
Mike 25/10/2020 05:28
Staring blankly at the constantly warping hole before shaking himself out of it. Hearing Koide's words, Sadao nods. "We'll be right back." He beckons to the other two, and makes for the library with haste. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 25/10/2020 20:33
Viraj steps to the edge of the hole. The shifting of the image causes him to rub his eyes. "The thing is still not able to hold its control over what we see. That is good... But yes, we should hurry." (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 25/10/2020 22:50
Ryuz, who has been keeping an intense glare at the shifting hole in the building responds to the request. "Sure, Koide. Keep an eye on that" he says without erring his sight "Shout if you see the monstrousity" before moving towards the stairs and up to the magister's room. "Let's go Takumi" he says to the anxious half-elf as he ascends.
Dandiil {Takumi} 25/10/2020 23:30
Takumi follows warily, understanding that there are people in need. "I'm right behind ya." He says as he climbs the staircase, watching for shifting breaks in the structure.
Kyle [Arcadian] 26/10/2020 20:56
Upstairs, the library is quiet, but for the whistling of the wind through the now open window. The crinkling of parchment can be heard as loose sheafs are tossed by the draught.
Mike 27/10/2020 02:53
Sadao scans the room, not finding any sign of the errant magister. He then realizes the new detail of the open window. Could it have something to do with the hydra? He turns to Ryu and Takumi. "You guys see if he's in his office, I'll look around here. Be careful: I got a bad feeling about this." He checks the library for signs of a struggle, or some clue to where the magister went.
Dandiil {Takumi} 27/10/2020 04:07
Takumi enters the office and immediately notices the mess of books and papers scattered around the room. He looks around for signs of life and any major signs of damage to the structure.
Kyle [Arcadian] 28/10/2020 06:57
After a few minutes navigating the twists and turns of the stacks, Takumi finds his way back to the spot where Koide first found the magister propped up against the wall in his circle of books. However, the books all appear to have been neatly tidied away and the magister is nowhere to be seen. Behind the sorcerer the moon shines brightly through the high open window and the night wind is chill on the back of his neck, making goosebumps rise as the hairs on his nape stand up on end.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 29/10/2020 14:48
"I see no signs of the magister here neither signs of the hydra. Maybe he is in another room?" Ryuz says as he closes the open window and walks out of the room.
TheOrsini 29/10/2020 15:23
Hearing Ryuz as he comes back into raised balcony, she calls out in response."No, too dangerous. If he doesn't want to be found, he could be ported off or be.. behind a series of protective traps." Koide considers, "We can't risk weakening our position as it stands." She looks to the rest, and then vomits from the nausea. Her last meal on parts of her robe and shoes, she curses, "Fuck."
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 29/10/2020 16:14
"Are you ok there, Koide?" Ryuz shouts towards his ill-stricken companion. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 30/10/2020 07:38
Takumi leaves the office, a little disoriented by sensations that are not exactly foreign, but not very comforting. He approaches Sadao with some information. "He's not in there, but it looks as though someone tried tidying up. There's an unpleasant feeling in that office though, almost like someone... or something was watching me. It was... creepy." (edited)
TheOrsini 30/10/2020 07:39
"I want this dead." Koide says in more of a moan than a threat to those below with her, shaking ick of her shoe and wiping her mouth. She gazes toward the hold, trying to make the image stable, and for a moment it does just that. "I'll manage, Ryuz." (edited)
Mike 01/11/2020 05:29
"Nothing here either." Sadao says, rising to his feet after giving the library a thorough sweep. "He could be... well, we'd better go check downstairs." He begins heading downward, and strains as he looks at the hole. "...Ready when you are."
TheOrsini 01/11/2020 05:39
Koide closes her eyes to focus and quiet herself- to center the body and hone it into the blade she carried, become one with the void. But it did not come. Her mind jumped between possible pitfalls and solutions for the next encounter. She concentrated... to ... force... them.... out.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 01/11/2020 15:29
"Maybe we'll find him down there,"Viraj says when the trio return without the magister. He pulls his maulaxe from his back to ready for what lies ahead in the darkness below. He draws a breath in sharply through his nose. "Let's take care of this thing." A flame springs to life in his hand to provide some light for their descent. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 01/11/2020 19:20
The walls of the tunnel flicker in the firelight, sometimes plain earth, sometimes following a smeared trail of blood down the centre, sometimes dripping with a thick layer of blood on all sides. The tunnel twists and turns down beneath the town, until it opens up into a wider circular chamber with other tunnels leading off from it. Sat in the middle of the cave, Aralynn, Koide and Viraj can make out a humanoid silhouette.
TheOrsini 04/11/2020 03:40
Koide checks the reflection in the blade with the firelight, before deciding whether to reveal their presence any further than they already have.
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 04/11/2020 19:03
Viraj holds up a hand to stop the others as the figure comes into view. "Someone in the cavern up ahead," he whispers. "Maybe our man from up there?" He looks to Koide to see if she can confirm.
TheOrsini 05/11/2020 11:04
Koide nods in confirmation.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 05/11/2020 17:28
Ryuz, on high alert from the amount of blood they have walked past, doesn't notice the figure at first. Having had the figure being pointed out to him, its head bowed down. He searches the surrounding area for anything amiss, and notices nothing out of place. "Move cautiously, I don't trust this place." He says, still paying attention to the area around them for any threats.
Mike 05/11/2020 20:45
"Okay." Sadao whispers back. Extending a hand to his side, he conjures up a few small lantern spirits, having them fill the area with their soft light. "Sir? Are you alright?" He calls in Honmin from a distance at first, before remembering the magister's deafness. He approaches warily to get his attention.
Kyle [Arcadian] 05/11/2020 21:51
As Sadao's lights fall upon the shadowy figure, its head slowly rises until the bard can make out that it is indeed the magister's face, his eyes swirling a dull purple. A snarl-like grimace fills the man's features and he is propelled upwards on a spiralling column of air. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 06/11/2020 00:42
Takumi sees the man rise up, so he grips his quarterstaff, and prepares himself. "I know that trick, as well...." "I wonder if he is using the same kind of magics I do." "I think something else may be coming"
TheOrsini 06/11/2020 09:12
Koide notices the magister's eyes, like her companions before, but his magic is a danger to their mission to destroying the creature. Despite her companions qualms on mortal strikes, she does not hesitate. 'She cannot.' Her hakama flutters in the wind as she dashes toward the man in the air, but it was not her katana raised in attack. No, instead, the woman flicks her wrist as she charges, drawing a hidden stilleto from its sheath within the sleeve. As she closes she counts the paces to the man hovering above the ground. Satisfied with distance, Koide takes a bounding step forward, ducking low, bringing all the energy of her momentum into a complete spin and arcs her throwing arm upward, releasing the three pronged dagger into the open air. The blade sails cleanly, spinning rapidly. Koide's sharp eyes notice the ripple of an invisible barrier of energy as it shimmers for an instant as the deadly blade strikes the magister. Koide rights her stance, preparing for a counter strike by bringing her katana up into a low guard. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 06/11/2020 19:06
"That thing has him under it's control," Viraj shouts moving up towards the magister. He shifts his weapon to his left hand and holds his right out towards the magister. "Jialg slahsal!" he says and a vine shoots from the palm of his empty hand. As if ready to rope a runaway calf, the vine whirls around over his head a few times causing thorns suddenly sprout and then the druid sends his lasso at his target. The barbs find hold in the man's skin and Viraj begins to pull him back towards the ground. The small vortex of air and dust dissipates and Viraj sees that the magister isn't actually flying, but he's being 'puppeted' by plant-like vines. They're thick and grey and going into his body from the back, holding him up and moving him around. The sick looking vines run off along the floor of the cave towards the exit. The resistance surprises him and the wraps the vine around his forearm to continue to drag him back to the cave floor. "Something coming up from the ground that's controlling him!" Viraj's vine releases the man and retracts back into his hand. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 06/11/2020 19:21
As Viraj yanks the magister out of the air, Ryuz sees the faint shadows of tendrils in the darkness the magister flowing with its movements. He unsheathes his odachi from its hold and begins charging at the unknown entity. He pushes himself as he runs at a full sprint, odachi held high in the air. As he nears, he can make out the vines, attached to the magister. He brings the massive blade down with a clash, as it cleaves through much of the mass of vines. A pale red fluid bursts from the mass, covering Ryuzuko's eyes. "Chikushou!!" he shouts as the liquid blinds him.
Dandiil {Takumi} 06/11/2020 21:53
Takumi sees the spraying vines and reacts quickly and without thought, he runs up toward the vines, reaching into his component pack. He stops staying well outside of, what he assumes, is their reach. "Kanzen ni kawaku" is muttered under his breath as he shakes the sand in his hand. What he expects to happen is to watch the severed vines shrivel into dry husks.... But, the fluid around the vines that was sprayed is what dissipates. "Well, that didn't work." (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 06/11/2020 22:07
The Magister lets out an aberrant wail as Ryu slices through a bunch of the tubes connected to him and lurches back up and backwards, weaving an incantation as he moves. A great wall of fire erupts across the middle of the cavern, catching Sadao, Koide, Viraj and Ryu in its path. Burns welt on skin and scales as the flames reach them, but Viraj is able to react in time with a protective incantation. (edited)
Cel 07/11/2020 04:55
Snapping into focus, Aralynn moves into position out outstretches both of her hands, saying a quick prayer as from one hand a bolt of light is thrown towards Koide, coating her wounds with healing energy. The other hand folds into a fist as a spiritual bell is formed around the magister, surrounding them with its dolorous tone. (edited)
Mike 07/11/2020 05:47
The burst of flame catches Sadao off guard, scorching his skin as he as he recoils backwards. He tries to get up right away, but struggles with burns on his calves. For a moment, he feels helpless, but looks to his side, and sees the lantern spirits still with him. Reaching towards one light, he whispers an entreaty to the ancient spirits. "Chá»¯a lành." The lantern complies, hovering down to his legs, and letting a more benevolent warmth cover them, partially healing his wounds. As he rises to his feet, he points to the blinded Ryu, and a lantern flies to him, offering meager comforts to the dragonborn. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 07/11/2020 21:15
Viraj roars in pain as the wall of fire comes over him. "Soo stiagh!" A barrier appears around himself that absorb some of the elemental power from the fire, feeding the rage of the druid. With the hairs from his fur-lined hide armor singed and smoking, he staggers back. He sees that many of the others didn't fare as well as he. Once again he conjures an emerald-green fiery spirit to soothe the group's wounds, then steps into it himself. "Use this to heal yourself," he suggests to the others before marching back to the edge of the wall of fire. The thorny vine shoots out and grasps the magister again. As the vine winds back into the druid and pulls the man into his own fire, a sizzling and popping sound is heard as several of the tendril burst off of his back and shrivel up black from the flames. (edited)
TheOrsini 08/11/2020 04:42
Koide could see parts of her dark curls were singed by the flames, the stinging of burns across her body. There were parts of her that were numb, no feeling that gave her more worry. She no longer had the strength or the will to maintain a guard position. She bit her lip hard to fight the scream welling inside her, until trickles of blood oozed down the side of her mouth. She takes a step; noticing the druid's magical spirits floating nearby - pain took her and she nearly fell from the agony and the burning. Large sections of her robe were burned away, but enough remained to maintain modesty. Her sword dragged across the ground from her fatigue, but she fought the urge to prop up on the blade. Smoldering embers of cloth drifted in the wind as she tried another step... and another... finally making within the fountain's healing effect. The pain eased for a moment before her leg nearly gave out on her, pitching Koide to the right. She stepped out of the healing stream only to barely recover her balance. The pain returned with a vengeance and she couldn't even bring herself to speak.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 08/11/2020 09:07
Reeling back from the unseen inferno that suddenly hits him, scorching his body through the gaps in his armor, leaving faint burns. Ryuzuko, still blinded, and angered, from the red fluid and now from being burned, straightens out his back, his full height towering over his nearby companions. He holds his odachi pointed to the ground as he claps his hands together, praying to his kami for strength and stamina. A wave of energy falls over him, reinvigorating his body and calms his thoughts. The change in his state of mind allows him to sense the magical energy of the nature spirit Viraj summoned. He recognizes it from their flight from the collapsing tunnel. He walks in the direction of the magic and after a short while, he feels the energy of the emerald-green spirit healing his burns enough to stop the pain. The red fluid then begins to dissipate, allowing him to see again. "What in the Kuso is going on?!" Ryuz says, seeing the flames separating the party from the magister, currently also engulfed in flames, as well as his nearby companions scrambling for aid. (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 08/11/2020 21:32
Takumi sees Koide struggling, and knows that she is too stubborn to ask for assistance. He pulls back his arm and a dagger that appears to be made of ice appears in his fingertips. With a smooth motion, the half elf flings the ice knife toward the magister, grazing his leg. The subsequent explosion of ice seemed no more than a light hailstorm around the magister and the vines. Takumi uses the distraction of the falling ice to make his way to the battered Koide. He offers his shoulder and with a smile on his face... "Come on, miss, this adventure is just beginning." He then offers his staff and looks at her strange sword. "Trade ya for now, you can lean on this too. And beat things with it." He knows this offer is a longshot, but she may need the extra support. (edited)
Kyle [Arcadian] 09/11/2020 15:22
The magister lets out an ear-piercing wail in response to the assault. On the ground behind the man, more worm-like tendrils snake along the ground before shooting up and into his back. The magister jerks involuntarily and something can be seen beneath his skin running along his limbs and churning in his guts.
Mike 09/11/2020 21:54
Sadao grits his teeth, shrugging off the debilitating effects of the horrendous scream. Something like that coming from a human was disturbing, to say the least. He rushes over towards Viraj and Koide, passing through the lingering healing flames the druid had conjured. Letting it heal some more of his burns, he holds out his hand and gathers some of the ethereal flame, which takes on a multicolored hue in his hands, like the lanterns. He spreads it to Koide, restoring her vitality while she is left reeling from the shriek.
Cel 09/11/2020 22:51
Aralynn extends her hand for a second attack, but quickly retracts it to cover her ears as her senses are overwhelmed by the magister's wail. After a few seconds, she is able to open her eyes and look forwards, trying to understand what is happening to the magister.
TheOrsini 10/11/2020 00:03
The screeching sound is almost numbing to the pain that Koide feels all over. The katana falls from her grip, as she begins to collapse to the ground in a spasm. She pitches from the trauma but only Takumi's rescue hands keeps her stable enough to stand. Her eyes glaze over, reaching into her reserves to ignore all the pain and anguish, but her spirit fails her and she is helpless there. A tear stings as it creeps across the burns on her face - its own form of torture. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 10/11/2020 16:44
Viraj steps back into healing flames and more of the blisters are soothed. With half the group reeling from the sonic assault, he transfers the flames so that they rest on Koide hoping to allay some of her injuries. He then turns his focus to the magister. A look of disgust comes over his when he sees the activity within the man's body. Taking up his weapon with both hands the charges with all his fury. The stored flame from the wall of fire springs to life in the axe head of his weapon. The powerful strike lops of a leg for the magister as he is held aloft. A sizzling sound is heard as the tendrils within are cauterized by the druid's axe. "There's not much left of whatever evil that holds him! (edited)
TheOrsini 10/11/2020 23:47
The only muscles Koide can muster are the few keeping her on her feet, leaning against Takumi. She feels the pain of being pressed upon him, but there is no other recourse. Only the gentle caresses from the healing spirit give her any comfort to the agony. (edited)
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 11/11/2020 08:29
The screech let out by the magister, slightly deafened by Ryuzuko's helmet, rings through his ears. He quickly turns to face the sound, seeing more and more vines pierce into the magister. "That... cannot be good." he says with disgust in his voice. He then grasps his odachi with both hands, holding it behind him, the edge of the blade facing upwards. Sadao's magical lantern floats past his vision, giving clarity to his mind. As it passes Ryuz stomps into the floor, charging at full speed towards the magister. "I'm sorry that we could not save you..." he says loudly with remorse as he nears the infested man. As he gets within striking range of the magister, Ryuz slams his left foot into the ground, using the impact to leverage his blade high into the air. His right leg fires forward as the blade swings down, slamming into the ground. Half of the man's body slowly starts to slide away, as a clear cut can be seen straight through his torso as it flops onto the floor..
08:29
  • The magister's eyes lose their purple glow as he coughs up a spray of blood which trickles down what is left of his body. Sadao, who is nearby, could swear he heard the words "Xièxiè..." come from the man as his body goes limp. Ryuzuko then swings his sword around, slamming the tip of the blade into the dirt, holding onto the hilt with one hand. He pulls his head back, sucking in a large amount of air. Then, as quickly as his blade was brought down, Ryuz shoots forward as a storm of icy cold air expels from his gapping jaw. The torrent covers the magister and the vines, freezing every exposed cut instantly. The tendrils begin to wriggle and writhe before slithering off into the darkness. His sword still in the ground, Ryuzuko claps his hands together, praying to the gods to send the man's soul to heaven. "No one deserves this fate..." Ryuz says sorrowfully, staring down at the magister's burned, violated, and bisected body. He yanks his sword out of the ground, slashes much of the blood off with a strong swing before cleaning it off with his red waist cloth and sheathing it back onto his pack
 (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 11/11/2020 08:37
The screech of the magister surprises Takumi, and he fought the urge to cover his ears with his hands, in fear of dropping Lady Koide. He continues holding her weight and though obviously struggling, doesn't give up the fight to fall to the ground. He walks her around the little glowing thing that seems to be helping her regain her strength, using his own quarterstaff to help support both of their weight. He watches the menace of combat, knowing that he should probably be helping more than he has, but his friends have always come first. The voice of old Naku whispers in his ear 'You don't have friends, they are just tools to be used and discarded.' but The half elf has never been the type to 'leave a friend to the guard' As the magister finally falls to the ground, Takumi tries to track where the vines went. It seems the freezing breath of the Dragonborn may have stalled the spray of severed vines.
TheOrsini 11/11/2020 08:42
With Takumi's aide, Koide slowly feels some of her burns begin to heal as they lean into the healing spirits, while letting the others bathe in its restorative power. But the healing only dulls the pain. She finally gets enough strength to thank her friend, "Thank you, Takumi." A tear streams from her eye in frustration for her weakness. And in the back of her head, she felt a debt growing to the mage. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 11/11/2020 15:10

To ease the troubled dragonborn he rests a hand on Ryu's shoulder a moment before return to the rest. "Let's get those wounds healed up while the fire is still going," he suggests to everyone. He begins to march through the fire elemental. "We have a one more thing to root out!" (edited)
Dandiil {Takumi} 12/11/2020 18:50
Takumi tentatively releases Koide to move about on her own, "Are you ok now? We have to look out for each other, you would have done the same for me." Seeing that she's moving on her own, he drops to the ground to rest a moment. Then he looks down the hall... "The vines were a bit frozen when they started retreating, there may not be much to follow. We should probably move on in... When you are well enough of course."
TheOrsini 12/11/2020 21:31
She feels the strength beneath her, not wanting to let go of the support for a moment, but as Takumi pulls away, Koide regains her footing. Her confidence was a slower mender. She had faced down a dreaded werebeast before and had been able to dodge the creature's attacks with ease, finally bringing it down by attrition and silver. Her skill and training had been the foundation for her pride and resolve. This new creature tested every aspect of her experience. Its ability to control others, even a spellcaster. Koide clenches her fist, but there is a dull pain in the grip. Despite the healing, it still ached in her body. 'This was going to be a long recovery.' But she could not delay their chance on her account in the same way that she had paid no mind to the magister's life before. She walks over to the severed corpse of the man she had passed sentence upon less than a minute ago, saying a small silent prayer for the dead. She ends it in the foreign tongue that her sensei had instructed her, "Requiescet in pace." She bows to the dead, and then the ceremony complete, she bends downs pulls the stilleto from the corpse's right shoulder where it had lodged earlier. She looks for a strip of cloth to clean the blood from it, but there is none free of the crimson gore. She reaches down for the ruins of her hakama and cleans the blade there. Despite the pain, she manages to paces back over to her fallen katana and sheathes it in the surprisingly uncharred scabbard. ` (edited)
21:31
Her thoughts jumps to her medallion, but she finds it untarnished from the flames as well. Its protections still functioning. With relief her thoughts swing to more ill-afforded pleasantries. She wished for some more time to gather her strength or a ration from her backpack and chest that were back at the firework's warehouse. 'No. You've burdened them long enough,' she says to herself. She closes her eyes and tries to shut out the pain; they open with the intensity of the fire burning in her skin. Through gritted teeth, she finally addresses the party in answer to their urgency, "Let's go."
Mike 14/11/2020 18:18
Sadao can't stand to look at the body. Before they left, he thought they'd be able to get the magister out. When they returned, he'd prepared himself for the possibility that he might be dead. But the group having to kill him themselves? That he hadn't considered. He tries to put it out of mind, like the hydra itself could do, but found it impossible.
"Requiescet in pace."
Koide's words cut through his ruminations like her blade. He doesn't fully grasp the meaning of the phrase, but believes that it's brought the magister's newly formed spirit some measure of peace. He looks over at the bloodstained warrior, and feels reassured, seeing her press on despite her wounds. If she wouldn't acknowledge them verbally, then neither would he. "Yeah. Let's." Sadao follows along, watching her and the others, readying himself to heal their wounds and keep them invigorated, when battle reared its ugly head again.
Kyle [Arcadian] 14/11/2020 20:28
As Koide draws her blade from the magister's corpse, the gleam of metal in Sadao's dancing lights catches her eye. Something is hanging around the man's neck.
TheOrsini 14/11/2020 23:36
"Huh, what's this?" Koide asks aloud to herself looking more closely. (edited)
Cel 15/11/2020 03:14
Aralynn slowly starts taking steps towards the corpse, stopping at about 15 feet from it, finding herself fighting against her training as a cleric, not wanting to place her own ceremonial magic on the body for fear of touching the corrupted creature. A mixture of guilt and fear fills her heart as she shakingly starts a prayer instead, wishing for the magister to find rest despite what the Hydra did to it. ''Yes, we should move on while we still can.'' She takes a second to compose herself before following the group, trying to find a balance between staying close to them for safety and keeping her distance from the allies who could turn on her at any moment.
Kyle [Arcadian] 15/11/2020 07:31
Hanging on a chain around the magister's neck, Koide finds a brass key and a tiny silver bell with no clapper.
TheOrsini 15/11/2020 07:43

Dandiil {Takumi} 15/11/2020 20:12
Takumi can't imagine what Koide would want to show him at the top half of the corpse. The fresh dead are always disturbing to him, he's not sure whether the soul is still there, and the magister already seemed dead when he was fighting with the party. Takumi cautiously approaches, resisting the urge to retch up the small meal that he recently snacked on. Holding his breath, he prepares to see the worst of what Koide has to show him, and is relieved when she presents the brass key and bell. "The key just looks like a normal brass key, probably fits a lock on a door or large chest. The bell is missing the clacker, that's kind of strange. But it does have an appeal to it. The silver may have some value. Some simple items are used for spells sometimes. I used just plain sand on that failure of a spell earlier. If the bell has a specific use, I am afraid that I don't know the spell."
TheOrsini 16/11/2020 01:49
Koide pulls the oddity from the magister's neck, knowing they don't have time to puzzle it out further. She realizes she doesn't have her bag with her and thinks for a moment, ignoring the pain of walking. And finally decides to tie the chain to the strap holding her katana's sheath. Looking at her katana she decides to try to hide her weakness in order to not destroy her party's morale. She draws it and begins to pace down the tunnel expecting the others to follow, tracing after the tendrils of abberant flesh.
Drake [ Shadow | Juke | Magnir ] 16/11/2020 03:55
Ryuz follows closely behind Koide, wakizashi and shield in hand, eyes fixated ahead. He can see the pain Koide is going through to tread on ahead, although she would never admit it herself. She was always too proud to falter or show weariness, even if it meant great harm to herself. Ryuzuko has always tried his best to alleviate her troubles as well as those they came across. (edited)
Trent [Astrid|Berg|Declan] 16/11/2020 04:06

Dandiil {Takumi} 16/11/2020 05:14
Takumi walks alongside Koide, knowing that her pride won't allow her to request aid in walking.
